summary.span: 在可自訂的格線中顯示資料。

span.span: Displays data in a customizable grid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項提供可自訂的資料表，以顯示資料。The control provides a customizable table for displaying data. 類別允許自訂的資料格、 資料列、 資料行和透過屬性使用的框線，例如， ， ，和。The class allows customization of cells, rows, columns, and borders through the use of properties such as , , , and . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[基本格式與樣式設定 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/basic-formatting-and-styling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Basic Formatting and Styling in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/basic-formatting-and-styling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 您可以使用控制項來顯示資料，不論基礎資料來源。You can use a control to display data with or without an underlying data source. 如果不指定資料來源，您可以建立資料行和資料列包含資料並將它們加入直接使用和屬性。Without specifying a data source, you can create columns and rows that contain data and add them directly to the using the and properties. 您也可以使用來存取集合物件和屬性讀取或直接寫入儲存格的值。You can also use the collection to access objects and the property to read or write cell values directly. 索引子也可直接存取的資料格。The indexer also provides direct access to cells. 您可以設定為手動填入控制項的替代和屬性要繫結至資料來源，並會自動填入資料。As an alternative to populating the control manually, you can set the and properties to bind the to a data source and automatically populate it with data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中顯示的資料](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/displaying-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Displaying Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/displaying-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 當使用非常大量的資料，您可以設定屬性`true`顯示可用的資料子集。When working with very large amounts of data, you can set the property to `true` to display a subset of the available data. 虛擬模式要求實作資料快取要從中控制項填入。Virtual mode requires the implementation of a data cache from which the control is populated. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料顯示模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/data-display-modes-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Data Display Modes in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/data-display-modes-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需有關可用功能控制，請參閱[DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/datagridview-control-windows-forms.md)。For additional information about the features available in the control, see [DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/datagridview-control-windows-forms.md). 下表提供一般工作的直接連結。The following table provides direct links to common tasks. - [操作說明：將資料繫結至 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbk67b6z\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Bind Data to the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbk67b6z\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [操作說明：將工具提示加入至 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的個別儲存格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2249cf0a\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Add ToolTips to Individual Cells in a Windows Forms DataGridView Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2249cf0a\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [操作說明：設定 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項的字型和色彩樣式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/z2akwyy7\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Set Font and Color Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/z2akwyy7\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [操作說明：使用設計工具變更 Windows Forms DataGridView 資料行的類型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/053656ss\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Change the Type of a Windows Forms DataGridView Column Using the Designer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/053656ss\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [操作說明：使用設計工具將資料繫結至 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/33w255ac\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Bind Data to the Windows Forms DataGridView Control Using the Designer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/33w255ac\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [操作說明：使用設計工具設定 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項的預設儲存格樣式和資料格式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/95y5fz2x\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Set Default Cell Styles and Data Formats for the Windows Forms DataGridView Control Using the Designer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/95y5fz2x\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [操作說明：格式化 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的資料](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9x2790s\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Format Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9x2790s\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [逐步解說：驗證 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的資料](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ykdxa0bc\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[Walkthrough: Validating Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ykdxa0bc\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [操作說明：自訂 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的資料格式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/z1cc356h\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/z1cc356h\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [逐步解說：使用兩個 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項建立主從式表單](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/y8c0cxey\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[Walkthrough: Creating a Master/Detail Form Using Two Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/y8c0cxey\(v=vs.110\).aspx) 雖然控制項取代，並將功能加入的較舊的版本控制如果您選擇，將會保留以提供回溯相容性及未來使用的控制項。Although the control replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, the control is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Windows Forms DataGridView 和 DataGrid 控制項之間的差異](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/differences-between-the-windows-forms-datagridview-and-datagrid-controls.md)。For more information, see [Differences Between the Windows Forms DataGridView and DataGrid Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/differences-between-the-windows-forms-datagridview-and-datagrid-controls.md). > [!NOTE] > 控制項繼承兩者和屬性從，但僅支援屬性。The control inherits both the and properties from , but supports only the property. 使用屬性控制項沒有任何作用。Using the property with the control has no effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化解除繫結控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize an unbound control. summary.span: 當新儲存格變成目前儲存格時，通知可存取的用戶端應用程式。

span.span: Notifies the accessible client applications when a new cell becomes the current cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將轉換成指定的資料列和資料行索引`objectID`和`childID`參數，呼叫方法多載兩次使用和值列舉型別。This method converts the specified row and column indexes into `objectID` and `childID` parameters and calls the method overload twice using the and values of the enumeration. `objectID`和`childID`取決於其顯示的順序，如果兩者可見的且從 1 開始計算的資料列或資料行的標頭中編號只有可見資料列和資料行。The `objectID` and `childID` are determined by numbering only the visible rows and columns in their display order, counting the row or column headers if they are visible, and starting with 1. 例如，如果資料行行首為可見，`objectID`第一個可見的非標題資料列是 2。For example, if column headers are visible, the `objectID` for the first visible nonheader row is 2.

exception.span: 的 屬性值小於 0，或大於控制項中的資料行數減 1。

span.span: The value of the property of is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.
-or-

exception.span: 的 屬性值小於 0，或大於控制項中的資料列數減 1。

span.span: The value of the property of is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.

para.span: 覆寫這個方法，當自訂控制項並修改目前的儲存格如何及何時變更。

span.span: Override this method when customizing the control and modifying how and when the current cell changes.

para.span: 例如，如果您建立將多個資料格合併成單一儲存格的自訂資料列型別，並據此修改巡覽，您可以覆寫這個方法以提供協助工具支援，您的變更。

span.span: For example, if you create a custom row type that merges multiple cells into single cells and you modify the navigation accordingly, you can override this method to provide accessibility support for your changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowUserToOrderColumns { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否已啟用手動重新調整資料行的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether manual column repositioning is enabled.

value.span: 如果使用者可以變更資料行順序，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the user can change the column order; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用資料行重新調整位置時，使用者可以將資料行標頭拖曳到新位置。When column repositioning is enabled, users can drag a column header to a new position. 請注意，已凍結和解除凍結的資料行形成兩個不同的群組。使用者可以重新定位在群組中，資料行，但無法將資料行從一個群組移到另。Note that frozen and unfrozen columns form two separate groups; users can reposition columns within a group, but cannot move a column from one group to the other. > [!NOTE] > 控制項不支援雙重緩衝。The control does not support double buffering. 如果設`true`中衍生控制項，使用者將不會收到的視覺化回饋時調整資料列、 資料行或標頭的大小，或重新排序資料行。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將說明中的此屬性使用控制項主要是供顯示。The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此範例中，自訂控制項的視覺外觀的數種方式，控制項設定為有限的互動性。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowUserToResizeColumns { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否可以調整資料行的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether users can resize columns.

value.span: 如果使用者可以調整資料行的大小，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if users can resize columns; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來防止使用者以手動方式變更資料行寬度。Use this property to prevent users from manually changing column widths. 這非常有用，例如，具有僅顯示資料行位置一次載入資料，以及資料行在該時間會調整的大小。This is useful, for example, with display-only columns where data is loaded once and columns are resized at that time. 如需使用者重新調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about user resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 控制項不支援雙重緩衝。The control does not support double buffering. 如果設`true`中衍生控制項，使用者將不會收到的視覺化回饋時調整資料列、 資料行或標頭的大小，或重新排序資料行。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性來控制項主要是供顯示。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此範例中，自訂控制項的視覺外觀的數種方式，控制項設定為有限的互動性。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowUserToResizeRows { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否可以調整資料列的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether users can resize rows.

value.span: 如果可以調整所有資料列的大小，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if all the rows are resizable; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來防止使用者以手動方式變更的資料列高度。Use this property to prevent users from manually changing row heights. 這非常有用，例如，使用僅顯示控制項，其中一次載入資料，以及在該時間的資料列而調整大小。This is useful, for example, with display-only controls where data is loaded once and rows are resized at that time. 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料列重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 如需使用者重新調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about user resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 控制項不支援雙重緩衝。The control does not support double buffering. 如果設`true`中衍生控制項，使用者將不會收到的視覺化回饋時調整資料列、 資料行或標頭的大小，或重新排序資料行。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性來控制項主要是供顯示。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此範例中，自訂控制項的視覺外觀的數種方式，控制項設定為有限的互動性。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ AlternatingRowsDefaultCellStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定套用至 奇數資料列的預設儲存格樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the default cell style applied to odd-numbered rows of the .

value.span: 要套用至奇數資料列的 。

span.span: A to apply to the odd-numbered rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項會顯示其使用由儲存格樣式的儲存格屬性，其他屬性的型別繼承樣式。The control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell property, which inherits styles from other properties of type . 透過指定索引上的奇數資料列中的資料格，樣式屬性覆寫透過指定的樣式， ，和，而且透過所指定的樣式會覆寫和屬性。For cells in rows with odd index numbers, the styles specified through the property override the styles specified through the , , and , and are overridden by the styles specified through the and properties. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 取得這個屬性，當預設值將會建立值如果屬性已不被存取。When getting this property, a with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed. 取得這個屬性的多個資料列時，這可能會造成效能影響。This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows. 您應該盡可能使用單一設定此屬性的多個資料列。Whenever possible, use a single to set this property for multiple rows. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性來建立在分類帳效果控制項。The following code example illustrates how to use this property to create a ledger effect in a control. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#20)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時，就會發生此事件屬性傳回屬性設定為新值或當屬性設定為新包含至少一個屬性值與上一個儲存格樣式物件不同。This event occurs when any property of the returned by the property is set to a new value or when the property is set to a new with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合不會執行有效率地使用大型的選項。The collection does not perform efficiently with large selections. 若要判斷是否中的所有資料格存取內容之前已選取集合中，檢查傳回值方法。To determine whether all the cells in the have been selected before you access the contents of the collection, check the return value of the method. 不過，這個方法可能會導致變成非共用的資料列。However, this method can cause rows to become unshared. 如需有關效能，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about performance, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個方法來避免計算涉及集合。The following code example illustrates how to use this method to avoid calculations involving the collection. The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為時，自動產生資料行`true`和或設定或變更屬性。Columns are automatically generated when this property is set to `true` and the or properties are set or changed. 資料行也可以自動產生時屬性已從`false`至`true`。Columns can also be automatically generated when the property is changed from `false` to `true`. 如果這個屬性是`true`和變更，使不符合先前的資料行的資料行不相符的資料行中資料的值會被捨棄。If this property is `true` and the changes so there are columns that do not match the columns of the previous value, data in the unmatched columns is discarded. 如果這個屬性就會忽略或未設定的屬性。This property is ignored if the or properties are not set. 當設`true`、控制項資料來源中產生一個資料行，其中每個公用屬性物件。When is set to `true`, the control generates one column for each public property of the objects in the data source. 如果繫結的物件實作控制項產生一個資料行所傳回的每一個屬性的介面，方法。If the bound objects implement the interface, the control generates one column for each property returned by the method. 每個資料行標頭將包含資料行代表屬性名稱的值。Each column header will contain the value of the property name the column represents. 如果您設定屬性，但組至`false`，您必須手動加入資料行。If you set the property but set to `false`, you must add columns manually. 您可以藉由設定每個加入的資料行繫結至資料來源屬性的繫結的物件所公開的屬性名稱。You can bind each added column to the data source by setting the property to the name of a property exposed by the bound objects. > [!NOTE] > 設定在 Windows Form 設計工具會自動設定屬性`false`並產生程式碼加入，將繫結資料來源中的每一個屬性的資料行。Setting the in the Windows Forms Designer automatically sets the property to `false` and generates code to add and bind a column for each property in the data source. 在設計階段產生的程式碼相當於下列範例所示手動加入的程式碼。The code that is generated at design-time is equivalent to the manually added code shown in the following example. 它不是自動產生的資料行，在執行階段，就會發生相同當屬性設定為`true`。It is not the same as the auto-generation of columns at run-time that occurs when the property is set to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以手動方式加入資料行，並將其繫結至資料來源設定至`false`。The following code example demonstrates how to add columns manually and bind them to a data source when you set to `false`. 在此範例中，控制項繫結至一份`Task`商務物件。In this example, a control is bound to a list of `Task` business objects. 然後，會加入資料行，並繫結至`Task`屬性透過屬性。Then, columns are added and are bound to `Task` properties through the property. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 存取 Windows Form DataGridViewComboBoxCell 下拉式清單中的物件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Access Objects in a Windows Forms DataGridViewComboBoxCell Drop-Down List](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding/CS/form1.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding/vb/form1.vb#100)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#256](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#256)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#256](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#256)]

summary.span: 調整指定資料行的寬度，以適合其儲存格的內容。

span.span: Adjusts the width of the specified column to fit the contents of its cells.

param.name: columnIndex
param.span: 要調整大小之資料行的索引。

span.span: The index of the column to resize.

summary.span: 調整指定資料行的寬度，以適合其所有儲存格的內容 (包括標題儲存格)。

span.span: Adjusts the width of the specified column to fit the contents of all its cells, including the header cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制資料行重新調整大小時。This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes. 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料行寬度如果更新版本的資料行的內容變更，此資料行將不會自動調整。The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust. 若要調整大小的所有資料行，請使用方法。To resize all columns, use the method. 若要設定資料行自動調整它的內容變更時，使用屬性或資料行屬性。To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the property or the column property. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用這個方法將大到足以容納新資料格的值的資料行寬度。The following code example uses this method to make the column width large enough to accommodate a new cell value. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 處理 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#211](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewRowDemo.cpp#211)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#211](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewRowDemo.cs#211)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#211](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewrowdemo.vb#211)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制資料行重新調整大小時。This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes. 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料行寬度如果更新版本的資料行的內容變更，此資料行將不會自動調整。The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust. 若要調整大小的所有資料行，請使用方法。To resize all columns, use the method. 若要設定資料行自動調整它的內容變更時，使用屬性或資料行屬性。To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the property or the column property. 這個多載可讓您指定計算中一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列的值為基礎的新寬度調整大小模式。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用這個方法將大到足以容納新資料格的值的資料行寬度。The following code example uses this method to make the column width large enough to accommodate a new cell value. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 處理 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#211](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewRowDemo.cpp#211)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#211](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewRowDemo.cs#211)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#211](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewrowdemo.vb#211)]

Protected Sub AutoResizeColumn (columnIndex As Integer, autoSizeColumnMode As DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode, fixedHeight As Boolean)
protected: void AutoResizeColumn(int columnIndex, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode autoSizeColumnMode, bool fixedHeight);

param.name: columnIndex
param.span: 要調整大小之資料行的索引。

span.span: The index of the column to resize.
One of the values.

param.name: fixedHeight
param.span: 表示根據目前的資料列高度來計算新的寬度； 則表示在預期資料列高度也將會調整的情況下計算寬度。

span.span: Adjusts the width of the specified column using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the width with the expectation that row heights will subsequently be adjusted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制資料行重新調整大小時。This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes. 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料行寬度如果更新版本的資料行的內容變更，此資料行將不會自動調整。The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust. 若要調整大小的所有資料行，請使用方法。To resize all columns, use the method. 若要設定資料行自動調整它的內容變更時，使用屬性或資料行屬性。To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the property or the column property. 這個多載可讓您指定計算中一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列的值為基礎的新寬度調整大小模式。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 受到這個多載，並且為了讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例中衍生類別。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedHeight`是`false`，將計算資料行寬度，但卻將會呼叫或方法下一步。If `fixedHeight` is `false`, the column width will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the or method next. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight() cil managed

summary.span: 調整資料行行首的高度，以適合最大資料行行首的內容。

span.span: Adjusts the height of the column headers to fit the contents of the largest column header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制何時要調整大小資料行標頭。This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize. 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料行行首的高度如果資料行的內容標頭之後變更，則資料行的標頭將不會自動調整。The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust. 若要設定資料行標頭，其內容變更時自動調整大小，使用屬性。To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料行標頭會重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何調整大小資料行標頭，並按一下按鈕的結果資料列。The following code example demonstrates how to resize column headers and rows as a result of a button click. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize/VB/form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight(int32 columnIndex) cil managed

param.name: columnIndex
param.span: 包含已變更內容的行首之資料行的索引。

span.span: The index of the column containing the header with the changed content.

summary.span: 根據指定資料行中的行首內容之變更來調整資料行行首的高度。

span.span: Adjusts the height of the column headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制時，只指定資料行中的標頭的內容已變更使用者編輯或變更的結果繫結的資料來源，重新調整大小資料行標頭。This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified column have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source. 資料行行首的高度會調整一次每個方法呼叫的內容變更需要它; 如果如果資料行的內容標頭之後變更，則資料行的標頭將不會自動調整。The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust. 若要設定資料行標頭，其內容變更時自動調整大小，使用屬性。To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料行標頭會重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

param.name: fixedColumnsWidth
param.span: 表示根據目前的資料行寬度來計算新的高度； 則表示在預期資料行寬度也將會調整的情況下計算高度。

summary.span: 調整資料行行首的高度以適合其內容，並在預期接下來將調整資料行和/或資料列行首寬度的情況下，選擇性地計算高度。

span.span: Adjusts the height of the column headers to fit their contents, optionally calculating the height with the expectation that the column and/or row header widths will subsequently be adjusted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制何時要調整大小資料行標頭。This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize. 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料行行首的高度如果資料行的內容標頭之後變更，則資料行的標頭將不會自動調整。The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust. 若要設定資料行標頭，其內容變更時自動調整大小，使用屬性。To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料行標頭會重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 受到這個多載，並且為了讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例中衍生類別。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedColumnsWidth`或`fixedRowHeadersWidth`參數`false`，資料行首的高度會計算您將這類呼叫方法時會和下一步。If the `fixedColumnsWidth` or `fixedRowHeadersWidth` parameters are `false`, the height of the column headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the methods such as and next. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

MemberSignature.Value: protected void AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight (int columnIndex, bool fixedRowHeadersWidth, bool fixedColumnWidth);
.method familyhidebysig instance void AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight(int32 columnIndex, bool fixedRowHeadersWidth, bool fixedColumnWidth) cil managed
Protected Sub AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight (columnIndex As Integer, fixedRowHeadersWidth As Boolean, fixedColumnWidth As Boolean)
protected: void AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight(int columnIndex, bool fixedRowHeadersWidth, bool fixedColumnWidth);

param.name: columnIndex
param.span: 資料行行首的索引，應該使用該行首的內容來判斷新的高度。

span.span: The index of the column header whose contents should be used to determine new height.

param.name: fixedRowHeadersWidth
param.span: 表示根據目前資料列行首的寬度計算新的高度； 則表示在預期資料列行首的寬度也將會調整的情況下計算高度。

span.span: to calculate the new height based on the current width of the row headers; to calculate the height with the expectation that the row headers width will also be adjusted.

param.name: fixedColumnWidth
param.span: 表示根據指定資料行的目前寬度計算新的高度； 則表示在預期資料行寬度也將會調整的情況下計算高度。

span.span: to calculate the new height based on the current width of the specified column; to calculate the height with the expectation that the column width will also be adjusted.

summary.span: 根據指定資料行中行首內容的變更來調整資料行行首的高度，並在預期接下來將調整資料行和/或資料列行首寬度的情況下，選擇性地計算高度。

span.span: Adjusts the height of the column headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified column, optionally calculating the height with the expectation that the column and/or row header widths will subsequently be adjusted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制時，只指定資料行中的標頭的內容已變更使用者編輯或變更的結果繫結的資料來源，重新調整大小資料行標頭。This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified column have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source. 資料行行首的高度會調整一次每個方法呼叫的內容變更需要它; 如果如果資料行的內容標頭之後變更，則資料行的標頭將不會自動調整。The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust. 若要設定資料行標頭，其內容變更時自動調整大小，使用屬性。To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料行標頭會重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 受到這個多載，並且為了讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例中衍生類別。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedColumnWidth`或`fixedRowHeadersWidth`參數`false`，資料行首的高度會計算您將這類呼叫方法時會和下一步。If the `fixedColumnWidth` or `fixedRowHeadersWidth` parameters are `false`, the height of the column headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the methods such as and next. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

exception.span: 不在 0 到資料行數目減 1 的有效範圍內。

span.span: is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.

summary.span: 調整所有資料行的寬度，以適合其儲存格的內容。

span.span: Adjusts the width of all columns to fit the contents of their cells.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AutoResizeColumns() cil managed

summary.span: 調整所有資料行的寬度，以適合其所有儲存格的內容 (包括標題儲存格)。

span.span: Adjusts the width of all columns to fit the contents of all their cells, including the header cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制何時要調整大小的資料行。This method is useful if you want to control when columns resize. 每個方法呼叫; 會一次調整資料行寬度如果更新版本的資料行的內容變更，資料行就不會自動調整。The column widths are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the columns later change, the columns will not automatically adjust. 若要調整大小的特定資料行，請使用方法。To resize a specific column, use the method. 若要設定的內容變更時自動調整大小的資料行，使用屬性或資料行屬性。To set the columns to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the property or the column property. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會調整所有欄位至最適大小之資料行和資料行標頭的內容。The following code example resizes all columns to fit the contents of the columns and the column headers. 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 以程式設計方式調整儲存格為 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的內容納入](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing/CPP/programmaticsizing.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing/CS/programmaticsizing.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing/VB/programmaticsizing.vb#3)]

span.span: Adjusts the width of all columns using the specified size mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制何時要調整大小的資料行。This method is useful if you want to control when columns resize. 每個方法呼叫; 會一次調整資料行寬度如果更新版本的資料行的內容變更，資料行就不會自動調整。The column widths are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the columns later change, the columns will not automatically adjust. 若要調整大小的特定資料行，請使用方法。To resize a specific column, use the method. 若要設定的內容變更時自動調整大小的資料行，使用屬性或資料行屬性。To set the columns to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the property or the column property. 這個多載可讓您指定計算中一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列的值為基礎的新寬度調整大小模式。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new widths based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會調整所有欄位至最適大小之資料行和資料行標頭的內容。The following code example resizes all columns to fit the contents of the columns and the column headers. 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 以程式設計方式調整儲存格為 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的內容納入](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制何時要調整大小的資料行。This method is useful if you want to control when columns resize. 每個方法呼叫; 會一次調整資料行寬度如果更新版本的資料行的內容變更，資料行就不會自動調整。The column widths are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the columns later change, the columns will not automatically adjust. 若要調整大小的特定資料行，請使用方法。To resize a specific column, use the method. 若要設定的內容變更時自動調整大小的資料行，使用屬性或資料行屬性。To set the columns to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the property or the column property. 這個多載可讓您指定計算中一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列的值為基礎的新寬度調整大小模式。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new widths based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 受到這個多載，並且為了讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例中衍生類別。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedHeight`是`false`，將計算資料行寬度，但卻將會呼叫或方法下一步。If `fixedHeight` is `false`, the column widths will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the or method next. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

span.span: to calculate the new height based on the current width of the columns; to calculate the height with the expectation that the column widths will also be adjusted.

summary.span: 使用指定的調整大小模式調整指定資料列的高度，並在預期接下來將調整資料行寬度的情況下，選擇性地計算高度。

span.span: Adjusts the height of the specified row using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the height with the expectation that column widths will subsequently be adjusted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制資料列重新調整大小時。This method is useful if you want to control when a row resizes. 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料列高度如果更新版本的資料列的內容變更，則資料列將不會自動調整。The row height is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the row later change, the row will not automatically adjust. 若要調整大小的所有資料列，請使用方法。To resize all rows, use the method. 若要設定其內容變更時自動調整大小的資料列，使用屬性。To set the row to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the property. 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料列重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 這個多載可讓您指定計算中一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列的值為基礎的新高度調整大小模式。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new height based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 受到這個多載，並且為了讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例中衍生類別。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedWidth`是`false`，將計算資料列高度，但卻將會呼叫或方法下一步。If `fixedWidth` is `false`, the row height will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the or method next. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制何時要調整大小資料列標頭。This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize. 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料列行首的寬度如果資料列內容標頭之後變更，將資料列的標頭會自動調整。The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust. 若要設定資料列標頭時會變更其內容自動調整，請使用屬性。To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 這個方法可讓您指定計算中一組有限的標頭，例如顯示資料列的值為基礎的新寬度調整大小模式。This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only. 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

span.span: Adjusts the width of the row headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified row and using the specified size mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是如果您想要控制調整資料列標頭的大小，只變更的內容中指定的資料列的標頭有使用者編輯或變更的結果繫結的資料來源時很有用。This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified row have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source. 資料列標頭的寬度調整一次每個方法呼叫的內容變更需要它; 如果如果資料列內容標頭之後變更，將資料列的標頭會自動調整。The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust. 若要設定資料列標頭時會變更其內容自動調整，請使用屬性。To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 這個方法可讓您指定計算中一組有限的標頭，例如顯示資料列的值為基礎的新寬度調整大小模式。This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only. 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何根據第一個資料列行首的內容變更的標頭資料列寬度，調整大小。The following code example illustrates how to resize the row header widths based on changes to the contents of the first row header. 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 以程式設計方式調整儲存格為 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的內容納入](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制何時要調整大小資料列標頭。This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize. 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料列行首的寬度如果資料列內容標頭之後變更，將資料列的標頭會自動調整。The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust. 若要設定資料列標頭時會變更其內容自動調整，請使用屬性。To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 這個方法可讓您指定計算中一組有限的標頭，例如顯示資料列的值為基礎的新寬度調整大小模式。This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only. 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 受到這個多載，並且為了讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例中衍生類別。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedColumnHeadersHeight`或`fixedRowsHeight`參數`false`，將計算資料列標頭的寬度，但卻會這類呼叫方法和下一步。If the `fixedColumnHeadersHeight` or `fixedRowsHeight` parameters are `false`, the width of the row headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call methods such as and next. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制當資料列的大小。This method is useful if you want to control when rows resize. 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料列高度如果內容的更新版本的資料列變更時，資料列將不會自動調整。The row heights are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust. 若要調整大小的特定資料列，請使用方法。To resize a specific row, use the method. 若要調整大小的資料列子集，請使用多載。To resize a subset of rows, use the overload. 若要設定的內容變更時自動調整大小的資料列，使用屬性。To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the property. 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料列重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 這個多載可讓您指定計算新的高度根據一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列中值的調整大小模式。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new heights based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何調整非標頭資料格內容為基礎的所有資料列的大小。The following code example demonstrates how to resize all rows based on non-header cell content. 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 以程式設計方式調整儲存格為 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的內容納入](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing/CPP/programmaticsizing.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing/CS/programmaticsizing.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing/VB/programmaticsizing.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制當資料列的大小。This method is useful if you want to control when rows resize. 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料列高度如果內容的更新版本的資料列變更時，資料列將不會自動調整。The row heights are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust. 若要調整大小的特定資料列，請使用方法。To resize a specific row, use the method. 若要調整大小的資料列子集，請使用多載。To resize a subset of rows, use the overload. 若要設定的內容變更時自動調整大小的資料列，使用屬性。To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the property. 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料列重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 這個多載可讓您指定計算新的高度根據一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列中值的調整大小模式。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new heights based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 這個多載已受到保護，而且是可讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例中衍生類別。This overload is protected, and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedWidth`參數是`false`，將計算資料列高度，但卻將會呼叫或方法下一步。If the `fixedWidth` parameter is `false`, the row heights will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the or method next. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是如果您想要控制資料列的大小，但您想要調整大小只有特定資料列的子集，例如已更新的繫結記錄的範圍內時很有用。This method is useful if you want to control when rows resize, but you want to resize only a specific subset of rows, such as those within a range of bound records that have been updated. 資料列高度，以指定的資料列會一次調整每個方法呼叫。如果內容的更新版本的資料列變更時，資料列將不會自動調整。The row heights for the specified rows are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust. 若要調整大小的特定資料列，請使用方法。To resize a specific row, use the method. 若要調整大小的所有資料列，請使用不同的多載的方法。To resize all rows, use a different overload of the method. 若要設定的內容變更時自動調整大小的資料列，使用屬性。To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the property. 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料列重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 這個多載可讓您指定計算新的高度根據一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列中值的調整大小模式。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new heights based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這可改善效能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 受到這個多載，並且為了讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例中衍生類別。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedWidth`參數是`false`，將計算資料列高度，但卻將會呼叫或方法下一步。If the `fixedWidth` parameter is `false`, the row heights will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the or method next. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how column widths are determined.
A value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您設定控制項，以便填滿控制項，或調整儲存格的內容，自動調整資料行寬度。This property lets you configure the control so that column widths are automatically adjusted either to fill the control or to fit cell contents. 每當變更控制項的寬度調整大小就會發生在填滿模式。Size adjustments occur in fill mode whenever the width of the control changes. 在以內容為基礎的調整大小模式調整大小發生或儲存格內容變更時，啟用時，每當資料列高度變更時。In content-based sizing modes, size adjustments occur whenever cell contents change or, if is enabled, whenever row heights change. 某些以內容為基礎的調整大小模式可讓您限制目前所顯示的資料列的大小調整，以提升效能。Some content-based sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance. 若要變更個別資料行的調整模式，將其屬性。To change the sizing mode for an individual column, set its property. 這個屬性的預設值是，指出資料行繼承它的行為及其從控制項的屬性值。The default value of this property is , indicating that the column inherits its behavior and its property value from the control. 中的填滿模式資料行分割中所指定的比例的可用控制項寬度其屬性值。Columns in fill mode divide the available control width in proportions indicated by their property values. 適用於填滿模式寬度取決於減去從用戶端區域控制項的寬度的所有資料行的寬度。The width available for fill mode is determined by subtracting the widths of all other columns from the width of the client area of the control. 如果此寬度小於結合所有填滿模式資料行的值，會顯示水平捲軸、 最小寬度，以顯示所有填滿模式資料行和使用者資料行調整已停用。If this width is smaller than the combined values of all fill-mode columns, the horizontal scroll bar is displayed, all fill-mode columns are shown with their minimum widths, and user column-resizing is disabled. 如需有關資料行填入模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料行填入模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about column fill mode, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 只有包含資料行屬性值為`true`會自動調整其大小，而且變更的資料行可見性不會進行調整大小。Only columns with a property value of `true` are resized automatically, and changing the visibility of a column does not cause resizing to occur. 此外，當資料行自動調整設定，使用者將無法調整資料行寬度，使用滑鼠。Additionally, when columns are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the column widths with the mouse. 若要以程式設計方式調整資料行寬度，請使用或方法或一組資料行屬性。To adjust column widths programmatically, use the or methods or set the column property. 如需以內容為基礎的自動調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性主要/詳細資料案例中，兩個控制項會顯示兩個資料表中的父子式關聯性。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a master/detail scenario where two controls display data from two tables in a parent/child relationship. 在此範例中，主控制項的資料行調整大小模式是，而資料行寬度會以程式設計的方式初始化成載入的值。In this example, the column sizing mode for the master control is , and the column widths are programmatically initialized to fit the loaded values. 詳細資料控制項是設定為自動的資料行的調整大小模式，使資料行就會自動調整時的值變更 （例如，當使用者變更父資料表中的目前資料列）。The details control is set to an automatic column sizing mode so that columns will adjust automatically whenever the values change (for example, when the user changes the current row in the parent table). 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 建立主從式表單使用兩個 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/create-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Create a Master/Detail Form Using Two Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/create-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMasterDetails#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMasterDetails/CS/masterdetails.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMasterDetails#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMasterDetails/VB/masterdetails.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#257](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#257)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#257](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#257)]

span.span: A value indicating the sizing mode.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您設定控制項，以適合其內容，每當內容變更時，會自動調整資料列的高度。This property lets you configure the control so that row heights are automatically adjusted to fit their contents whenever the contents change. 如果已啟用，資料列高度也將進行調整資料行寬度變更時。If is enabled, row heights are also adjusted whenever column widths change. 某些調整大小模式可讓您限制目前所顯示的資料列的大小調整，以提升效能。Some sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance. 只有當資料列與屬性值為`true`會自動調整其大小，而且變更資料列的可見性不會進行調整大小。Only rows with a property value of `true` are resized automatically, and changing the visibility of a row does not cause resizing to occur. 此外，當自動調整設定的資料列時，使用者將無法調整資料列高度，以滑鼠。Additionally, when rows are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the row heights with the mouse. 自動調整大小的資料列的值會重新計算期間配置來說明所用的字型的大小。The value of an automatically sized row is recalculated during layout to account for the size of the font that is used. 若要取得正確，您應該擷取表單中的值而不是表單的建構函式中的事件。To get the correct , you should retrieve the value in the form's event instead of in the form's constructor. 若要以程式設計方式調整資料列高度，請使用或方法或一組資料列屬性。To adjust row heights programmatically, use the or methods, or set the row property. 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料列重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 如需以內容為基礎的自動調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定為自動調整大小資料列標頭和所有資料行的內容為基礎的資料列。The following code example demonstrates how to set the row to automatically resize based on the contents of the row headers and all of the columns. 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[如何： 自動調整儲存格時的內容變更 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Automatically Resize Cells When Content Changes in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizing#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizing/CPP/autosizing.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizing#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizing/CS/autosizing.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizing#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizing/VB/autosizing.vb#9)]

summary.span: 將目前儲存格置於編輯模式下。

span.span: Puts the current cell in edit mode.

returns.span: 如果目前儲存格已經處於編輯模式下，或成功進入編輯模式，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the current cell is already in edit mode or successfully enters edit mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回`false`儲存格無法進入編輯模式，這可能會針對多種原因所造成。This method returns `false` if the cell fails to enter edit mode, which can happen for a number of reasons. 這個方法會傳回`false`如果目前儲存格為唯讀。This method returns `false` if the current cell is read-only. 它也會傳回`false`如果儲存格屬性是`null`（這表示儲存格無法裝載編輯控制項），但資料格類型未實作介面。It also returns `false` if the cell property is `null` (meaning the cell cannot host an editing control) and the cell type does not implement the interface. 如果資料格支援編輯，此方法就會引發事件，可以取消，並傳回`false`如果事件處理常式取消編輯。If the cell supports editing, this method raises the event, which can be canceled, and returns `false` if an event handler cancels the edit. 如果未取消編輯，而且資料格可以裝載編輯控制項，這個方法會初始化的控制項，並顯示。If the edit is not canceled and the cell can host an editing control, this method initializes the control and displays it. 如果初始化失敗，則這個方法會傳回`false`。If the initialization fails, this method returns `false`. 如果資料格成功進入編輯模式，屬性會傳回`true`。If the cell successfully enters edit mode, the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of this method. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CancelRowEdit As QuestionEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 控制項的 屬性為 ，且取消資料列中的編輯時。

span.span: Occurs when the property of a control is and the cancels edits in a row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當是在虛擬模式中，會認可變更，讓資料快取資料格層級預設。When the is in virtual mode, changes are committed to the data cache at the cell level by default. 實作資料列層級的交易時，就可以使用事件。The event can be used when implementing row-level transactions. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理此事件虛擬模式中的控制項。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event for a control in virtual mode. 當控制項處於編輯模式，`rowInEdit`變數會保留正在編輯的資料列的索引和`customerInEdit`變數會保存到該資料列對應的客戶物件的參考。When the control is in edit mode, the `rowInEdit` variable holds the index of the row being edited, and the `customerInEdit` variable holds a reference to a Customer object corresponding to that row. 當使用者取消離開編輯模式時，這個物件可以捨棄。When the user cancels out of edit mode, this object can be discarded. 如果使用者已編輯的資料列是新的記錄的資料列，不過，舊客戶的物件會捨棄而取代新，讓使用者可以重新開始進行編輯。If the row the user was editing is the row for new records, however, the old Customer object is discarded and replaced with a new one so that the user can begin making edits again. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中實作虛擬模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [Walkthrough: Implementing Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#170](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/CPP/virtualmode.cpp#170)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#170](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/CS/virtualmode.cs#170)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#170](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/VB/virtualmode.vb#170)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果以外屬性設定為， ，或、屬性必須是系統色彩。If the property is set to anything other than , , or , the property must be a system color. 您無法將此屬性設定為值，這是唯讀，這個值表示，已透過使用的自訂儲存格框線樣式屬性。You cannot set this property to the value, which is a read-only value indicating that the cell border style has been customized through the use of the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的名為`dataGridView1`，然後呼叫`SetUpDataGridView`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理常式。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 請確定所有事件都都具有其事件處理常式相關聯。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellClick As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於按一下儲存格的任何部分時。

span.span: Occurs when any part of a cell is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件發生於按一下儲存格的任何部分時，包含框線和邊框間距。This event occurs when any part of a cell is clicked, including borders and padding. 也會在使用者按下並釋放的空間索引鍵時按鈕儲存格或核取方塊儲存格焦點時，如果按下空格鍵，按一下資料格就會發生兩次的這些資料格類型。It also occurs when the user presses and releases the SPACE key while a button cell or check box cell has focus, and will occur twice for these cell types if the cell is clicked while pressing the SPACE key. 若要判斷按下儲存格內容時，處理事件。To determine when the cell contents are clicked, handle the event. 這個事件不會接收滑鼠位置的相關資訊。This event does not receive information about the mouse position. 如果事件處理常式需要的滑鼠位置的相關資訊，請使用事件。If the event handler needs information about the mouse position, use the event. 在按一下、 值的核取方塊變更，因此如果您不想計算預期的值根據目前的值之前，就會發生此事件，您通常會處理事件改為。For clicks in a , this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the event instead. 因為該事件發生時，只有使用者指定的值在認可時，這通常發生於焦點離開儲存格，您也必須處理事件。Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the event. 在該處理常式中，核取方塊儲存格的目前儲存格時，呼叫方法並傳入值。In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範井字遊戲的遊戲實作使用映像中的資料行中的事件處理常式控制項。The following code example shows a event handler in a Tic-Tac-Toe game implementation that uses image columns in a control. 除非遊戲便會結束或已按下儲存格，此事件處理常式會將儲存格的值設定為有兩個變數所代表的物件`x`和`o`。Unless the game is over or the cell has already been clicked, the event handler sets the cell value to one of two objects represented by the variables `x` and `o`. 這段程式碼會顯示在較大範例的一部分[How to： 使用 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的影像資料行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This code is part of a larger example shown in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellContentClick As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 按一下儲存格內的內容時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the content within a cell is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在按下儲存格內容時，就會發生此事件。This event occurs when the cell content is clicked. 當使用者按下並放開按鈕儲存格時空格鍵，或核取方塊儲存格焦點時，以及如果按下空格鍵，按一下儲存格內容，就會發生兩次的這些資料格類型時，它也會發生。It also occurs when the user presses and releases the SPACEBAR while a button cell or check box cell has focus, and will occur twice for these cell types if the cell content is clicked while pressing the SPACEBAR. 使用此事件可偵測的按鈕點選或點選連結。Use this event to detect button clicks for a or link clicks for a . 在按一下、 值的核取方塊變更，因此如果您不想計算預期的值根據目前的值之前，就會發生此事件，您通常會處理事件改為。For clicks in a , this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the event instead. 因為該事件發生時，只有使用者指定的值在認可時，這通常發生於焦點離開儲存格，您也必須處理事件。Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the event. 在該處理常式中，核取方塊儲存格的目前儲存格時，呼叫方法並傳入值。In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例提供此決定是否按下儲存格的連結資料格或按鈕儲存格並執行對應的動作結果的事件處理常式。The following code example provides a handler for this event that determines whether the clicked cell is a link cell or a button cell and performs the corresponding action as a result. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#60](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#60)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#60](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#60)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#60](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#60)]
