remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#286](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#286)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#286](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#286)]

summary.span: 發生於需要儲存格的捷徑功能表時。

span.span: Occurs when a cell's shortcut menu is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只發生事件時控制項屬性設定或其屬性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 當您處理您指定的處理常式中的捷徑功能表會顯示事件，每當使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵在資料格。When you handle the event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a cell. 當您想要顯示的捷徑功能表，取決於目前的狀態或儲存格的值，這非常有用。This is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by the current state or value of a cell. 事件也會發生值擷取屬性，或是以程式設計的方式，或當使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵在資料格。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a cell. 您可以使用和屬性來判斷狀態或儲存格值，並使用此資訊來變更或修改屬性。You can use the and properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the property. 這個屬性會初始化儲存格的值與事件值會覆寫的屬性。This property is initialized with the value of the cell property, which the event value overrides. 處理事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的設定儲存格多個資料格的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell value for multiple cells. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 您也可以指定快顯功能表，針對個別資料列，而不是個別儲存格的資料列設定屬性或處理事件。You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row property or handling the event. 資料格屬性設定會覆寫的資料列屬性設定值，而事件覆寫兩者事件和資料列屬性設定。The cell property setting overrides the row property setting, and the event overrides both the event and the row property setting. 不過，您可以指定`null`的儲存格的捷徑功能表，以防止遭到覆寫的資料列的捷徑功能表。However, you can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件處理常式，以顯示使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下資料格時，使用自訂的捷徑功能表。The following code example demonstrates how to use a event handler to display a custom shortcut menu used when the user right-clicks a cell. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/CPP/sharedrows.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/CS/sharedrows.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/VB/sharedrows.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellDoubleClick As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 使用者按兩下儲存格中的任何位置時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user double-clicks anywhere in a cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellEndEdit As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 目前所選取儲存格的編輯模式停止時發生。

span.span: Occurs when edit mode stops for the currently selected cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理這個事件來清除資料列屬性在先前設定的情況下事件處理常式。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to clear the row property in case it was previously set by a event handler. 新儲存格的值符合驗證準則，但按下 ESC，使用者會還原成舊資料格的值時，事件處理常式可以清除錯誤文字事件不會發生。The event handler can clear the error text when the new cell value meets the validation criteria, but when the user reverts to the old cell value by pressing ESC, the event does not occur. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 驗證 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-validating-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [Walkthrough: Validating Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-validating-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataValidation#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataValidation/CS/datavalidation.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataValidation#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataValidation/VB/datavalidation.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellEnter As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 控制項中的目前儲存格變更時，或是當控制項收到輸入焦點時。

span.span: Occurs when the current cell changes in the control or when the control receives input focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控制項不具有輸入的焦點且按下儲存格之前不是目前儲存格，此事件可能會發生兩次的按一下。This event may occur twice for a single click if the control does not have input focus and the clicked cell was not previously the current cell. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理這個事件來變更屬性的目前儲存格。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the property of the current cell. 在此範例設定的選取項目背景色彩事件，然後重設為上事件。In this example the selection background color is set in the event, then reset to on the event. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的名為`dataGridView1`，並確定其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#190](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#190)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#190](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#190)]

summary.span: 發生於儲存格的 屬性值變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property of a cell changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#291](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#291)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#291](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#291)]

summary.span: 需要儲存格的錯誤文字時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell's error text is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只發生事件時控制項屬性設定或其屬性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 處理事件很實用，當您想要判斷其值或狀態資料格的錯誤。Handling the event is useful when you want to determine the error for a cell depending on its value or state. 當您處理事件，並指定錯誤文字中處理常式中，錯誤圖像顯示在儲存格中除非屬性設定為`false`或儲存格處於編輯模式。When you handle the event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the cell unless the property is set to `false` or the cell is in edit mode. 當使用者將滑鼠指標移錯誤圖像時，錯誤文字會出現在工具提示中。When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip. 事件也會發生值擷取屬性。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved. 您可以使用和屬性來判斷狀態或儲存格值，並使用此資訊來變更或修改屬性。You can use the and property to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the property. 這個屬性會初始化儲存格的值與事件值會覆寫的屬性。This property is initialized with the value of the cell property, which the event value overrides. 處理事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的設定儲存格多個資料格的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell value for multiple cells. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立儲存格的錯誤訊息，而不需要取消共用資料列，或造成複製到共用的儲存格的儲存格錯誤。The following code example demonstrates how to create error messages for cells without unsharing rows or causing the cell error to be duplicated over all the shared cells. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/CPP/sharedrows.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/CS/sharedrows.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/VB/sharedrows.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellFormatting As DataGridViewCellFormattingEventHandler

summary.span: 需設定要顯示之儲存格內容的格式時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the contents of a cell need to be formatted for display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，控制項將會嘗試將儲存格的值轉換成適合顯示的格式。By default, the control will attempt to convert a cell's value into a format suitable for display. 例如，它會將數值轉換成文字 方塊儲存格中顯示字串。For example, it will convert a numerical value into a string for display in a text box cell. 您可以指定要使用的設定的格式設定慣例屬性這類屬性所傳回屬性。You can indicate the formatting convention to use by setting the property of the returned by properties such as the property. 如果您沒有足夠的標準格式，您可以自訂格式設定，請處理事件。If the standard formatting is insufficient, you can customize the formatting by handling the event. 此事件可讓您指出精確顯示值，以及儲存格樣式，例如背景和前景色彩，用於儲存格顯示。This event lets you indicate the exact display value as well as the cell styles, such as background and foreground color, to use for the cell display. 這表示您可以處理這個事件的任何一種格式，不管儲存格的值本身是否需要格式化的資料格。This means you can handle this event for any kind of cell formatting, regardless of whether the cell value itself needs formatting. 每一次，每個儲存格繪製，因此您應該避免的漫長處理在處理此事件時，就會發生事件。The event occurs every time each cell is painted, so you should avoid lengthy processing when handling this event. 也會發生此事件時的儲存格擷取或其方法呼叫。This event also occurs when the cell is retrieved or its method is called. 當您處理事件，屬性會初始化與儲存格的值。When you handle the event, the property is initialized with the cell value. 如果您提供從儲存格的值來顯示值的自訂轉換，將要轉換的值，以確保新值的儲存格所指定型別的屬性屬性。If you provide custom conversion from the cell value to the display value, set the property to the converted value, ensuring that the new value is of the type specified by the cell property. 若要指出格式化任何其他值是必要，設定屬性`true`。To indicate that no further value formatting is necessary, set the property to `true`. 此事件處理常式完成時，如果是`null`或不正確的型別，或屬性是`false`、使用格式化， ， ，和屬性所傳回的儲存格樣式屬性，使用儲存格初始化屬性。When the event handler completes, if the is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the property is `false`, the is formatted using the , , , and properties of the cell style returned by the property, which is initialized using the cell property. 值為何屬性，所傳回的物件的顯示屬性屬性用來呈現資料格。Regardless of the value of the property, the display properties of the object returned by the property are used to render the cell. 如需有關自訂格式化使用事件，請參閱[How to： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中自訂格式化資料](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-data-formatting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about custom formatting using the event, see [How to: Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-data-formatting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 若要避免效能的負面影響，在處理此事件時，存取參數傳遞的事件處理常式，而不是直接存取儲存格的儲存格。To avoid performance penalties when handling this event, access the cell through the parameters of the event handler rather than accessing the cell directly. 若要自訂格式化的使用者指定的值轉換成實際的資料格的值，處理事件。To customize the conversion of a formatted, user-specified value into an actual cell value, handle the event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理事件。The following code example shows how to handle the event. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellLeave As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 儲存格失去輸入焦點且不再是目前儲存格時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell loses input focus and is no longer the current cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理這個事件來變更屬性的目前儲存格。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the property of the current cell. 在此範例設定的選取項目背景色彩事件，然後重設為上事件。In this example the selection background color is set in the event, then reset to on the event. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的名為`dataGridView1`，並確定其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#190](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#190)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#190](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#190)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellMouseClick As DataGridViewCellMouseEventHandler

summary.span: 每當使用者以滑鼠按一下儲存格上的任何地方時發生。

span.span: Occurs whenever the user clicks anywhere on a cell with the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按一下 使用任何滑鼠按鈕，就會發生此事件。This event occurs when the user clicks using any of the mouse buttons. 使用屬性來判斷哪一個按鈕已按下。Use the property to determine which button was clicked. 若要偵測點選的資料格，例如按鈕或連結資料格中，內容使用事件。To detect clicks on the contents of a cell, such as a button or link within a cell, use the event. 此事件處理常式會接收的資料行索引和資料列的滑鼠指標位置的索引。The handler for this event receives the column index and row index of the mouse pointer position. 在按一下、 值的核取方塊變更，因此如果您不想計算預期的值根據目前的值之前，就會發生此事件，您通常會處理事件改為。For clicks in a , this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the event instead. 因為該事件發生時，只有使用者指定的值在認可時，這通常發生於焦點離開儲存格，您也必須處理事件。Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the event. 在該處理常式中，核取方塊儲存格的目前儲存格時，呼叫方法並傳入值。In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#295](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#295)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#295](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#295)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellMouseDoubleClick As DataGridViewCellMouseEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 中的儲存格被按兩下時。

span.span: Occurs when a cell within the is double-clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按兩下使用任何滑鼠按鈕時，就會發生此事件。This event occurs when the user double-clicks using any of the mouse buttons. 使用屬性來判斷哪一個按鈕已按下。Use the property to determine which button was clicked. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellMouseDown As DataGridViewCellMouseEventHandler

summary.span: 使用者在滑鼠指標位於儲存格界限內且按著滑鼠按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user presses a mouse button while the mouse pointer is within the boundaries of a cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按下任何滑鼠按鈕時，就會發生此事件。This event occurs when the user presses any of the mouse buttons. 使用屬性來判斷哪一個按鈕已按下。Use the property to determine which button was clicked. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#297](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#297)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#297](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#297)]

summary.span: 滑鼠指標進入儲存格時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters a cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範井字遊戲的遊戲實作使用映像中的資料行中的事件處理常式控制項。The following code example shows a event handler in a Tic-Tac-Toe game implementation that uses image columns in a control. 此事件處理常式會使用儲存格的值來決定資料指標和顯示的工具提示。The event handler uses the cell value to determine the cursor and ToolTip to display. 這段程式碼會顯示在較大範例的一部分[How to： 使用 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的影像資料行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This code is part of a larger example shown in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves a cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範井字遊戲的遊戲實作使用映像中的資料行中的事件處理常式控制項。The following code example shows a event handler in a Tic-Tac-Toe game implementation that uses image columns in a control. 資料指標和工具提示中所設定的事件處理常式會重設事件處理常式。The event handler resets the cursor and ToolTip, which are set in a event handler. 這段程式碼會顯示在較大範例的一部分[How to： 使用 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的影像資料行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This code is part of a larger example shown in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellPainting As DataGridViewCellPaintingEventHandler

summary.span: 需要繪製儲存格時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell needs to be drawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以處理此事件，以自訂控制項中的儲存格的外觀。You can handle this event to customize the appearance of cells in the control. 您可以繪製整個儲存格，您自己，或 [小畫家] 的資料格的特定部分，並使用或來繪製其他部分的方法。You can paint entire cells yourself, or paint specific parts of cells and use the or methods to paint other parts. 您也可以使用類別來繪製標準控制項使用的目前佈景主題。You can also use the class to paint standard controls using the current theme. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[視覺化樣式呈現控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). 如果您使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，您也可以存取的標準映像，您可以使用大型的程式庫控制項。If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the control. 當處理此事件，您應該透過事件處理常式的參數，而不是直接存取儲存格。When handling this event, you should access the cell through the parameters of the event handler, rather than access the cell directly. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用此事件可自訂的特定資料行中的所有資料格的外觀。The following code example illustrates how to use this event to customize the appearance of all cells in a particular column. 此程式碼是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-cells-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Cells in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-cells-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting/VB/form1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellParsing As DataGridViewCellParsingEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於已經修改儲存格值後，該儲存格離開編輯模式時。

span.span: Occurs when a cell leaves edit mode if the cell value has been modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，控制項將會嘗試將使用者指定的值，顯示在資料格來實際基礎資料格的值之資料格所指定的型別轉換屬性。By default, the control will attempt to convert a user-specified value displayed in a cell to an actual underlying cell value in the type specified by the cell property. 這項轉換會使用傳回的資料格的儲存格樣式的格式屬性屬性。This conversion uses the formatting properties of the cell style returned by the cell property. 如果標準轉換不符合您的需求，處理事件以提供自訂的值轉換為要求的類型。If the standard conversion does not meet your needs, handle the event to provide custom value conversion to the required type. 使用者可以進入編輯模式，使用指定的方法屬性，並且可以保留編輯模式中，資料格，以認可所有變更，將移到另一個資料格，或按下 ENTER 鍵。Users can enter edit mode using the method specified by the property, and can leave edit mode, committing any changes to a cell, by moving to another cell or by pressing ENTER. 按下 esc 鍵將會還原為值的任何變更認可之前, 和事件不會發生。Pressing ESC will revert any changes to the value before it is committed, and the event will not occur. 事件時才會發生實際已修改資料格的值，即使最後的值時的原始值相同。The event occurs only if the cell value has actually been modified, even if the final value is the same as the original value. 它也會發生時方法呼叫。It also occurs when the method is called. 當您處理事件，您可以自行轉換值，或您可以自訂預設轉換。When you handle the event, you can convert the value yourself or you can customize the default conversion. 例如，您可以將值轉換自己使用資料格使用類型轉換器，您所選擇的方法。For example, you can convert the value yourself using the cell method with type converters of your choosing. 或者，您可以讓預設的類型轉換器剖析值，但修改， ，和屬性所傳回的物件屬性，使用儲存格初始化屬性。Alternatively, you can let the default type converters parse the value, but modify the , , and properties of the object returned by the property, which is initialized using the cell property. 當您自行轉換值時，取代初始，其格式的值屬性之資料格所指定的型別轉換的值與屬性。When you convert the value yourself, replace the initial, formatted value of the property with the converted value in the type specified by the cell property. 若要指出不再剖析是必要，設定屬性`true`。To indicate that no further parsing is necessary, set the property to `true`. 此事件處理常式完成時，如果是`null`或不正確的型別，或屬性是`false`、使用資料格會剖析使用預設類型轉換器方法。When the event handler completes, if the is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the property is `false`, the is parsed using the cell method with default type converters. 這個方法的預設實作會剖析值使用， ，和中傳遞的儲存格樣式屬性。The default implementation of this method parses the value using the , , and properties of the cell style passed in. 如果值不等於，這個值剖析使用中傳遞的屬性和型別轉換子。If the value is not equal to , the value is parsed using the property and the type converters passed in. 若要自訂的資料格的值轉換為格式化的值來顯示，處理事件。To customize the conversion of a cell value into a formatted value for display, handle the event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理事件。The following code example shows how to handle the event. 它也示範如何使用類別。It also shows how to use the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時，就會發生此事件屬性傳回屬性設定為新值或當屬性設定為新包含至少一個屬性值與上一個儲存格樣式物件不同。This event occurs when any property of the returned by a property is set to a new value or when a property is set to a new with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. span.span: Occurs when one of the values of a cell style changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值時，就會發生事件其中下列的屬性變更傳回的物件：The event occurs when a property value of a object returned by one of the following properties changes: - - - - - - - - 如果其中一個屬性會設定為不同，不過對應*PropertyName* `Changed`就會發生事件，但事件不會發生。If one of these properties is set to a different , however, the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event occurs, but the event does not occur. 資料列、 資料行和資料格屬性的名稱*PropertyName* `Changed`事件開頭"`Row`"，"`Column`"，或"`Cell`"(例如， )。For row, column, and cell properties, the name of the *PropertyName*`Changed` event begins with "`Row`", "`Column`", or "`Cell`" (for example, ). 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellToolTipTextChanged As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 中儲存格的 屬性值變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the property value changes for a cell in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#307](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#307)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#307](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#307)]

summary.span: 需要儲存格的工具提示文字時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell's ToolTip text is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只發生事件時控制項屬性設定或其屬性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 當您處理您指定的處理常式中的工具提示文字會顯示事件，每當滑鼠指標位於儲存格和控制項屬性值是`true`。When you handle the event, the ToolTip text you specify in the handler is shown whenever the mouse pointer is over a cell and the control property value is `true`. 事件很實用，當您想要顯示由目前的狀態或儲存格的值決定的工具提示。The event is useful when you want to display ToolTips determined by the current state or value of a cell. 事件也會發生值擷取屬性，或是以程式設計的方式，或當滑鼠指標進入儲存格。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the mouse pointer enters a cell. 您可以使用和屬性來判斷狀態或儲存格值，並使用此資訊來變更或修改屬性。You can use the and properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the property. 這個屬性會初始化儲存格的值與事件值會覆寫的屬性。This property is initialized with the value of the cell property, which the event value overrides. 處理事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的設定儲存格多個資料格的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell value for multiple cells. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用資料繫結中顯示隱藏的資料行資訊的事件處理常式控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a event handler to display information from hidden columns in a data-bound control. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/CS/Form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/VB/Form1.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellValidated As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 儲存格完成驗證之後發生。

span.span: Occurs after the cell has finished validating.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理此事件可用來驗證後置處理的資料格的值。Handling this event is useful for post-validation processing of the cell value. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來清除事件屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to clear out the property. 在此範例中，事件設定如果使用者輸入無效，無法在資料格中的資料。In this example, the event sets the if the user enters data that is not valid into a cell. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/CS/form1.cs#50)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/VB/form1.vb#50)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellValidating As DataGridViewCellValidatingEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於儲存格失去輸入焦點、啟用內容驗證時。

span.span: Occurs when a cell loses input focus, enabling content validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取消這個事件會取消目前儲存格的變更。Canceling this event cancels the changes to the current cell. 此事件在資料繫結模式取消時，新的值不會發送到基礎資料來源。When this event is canceled in data-bound mode, the new value is not pushed to the underlying data source. 當此事件會在虛擬模式中，取消不會引發事件。When this event is canceled in virtual mode, the event will not be raised. 處理事件來執行驗證後置處理。Handle the event to perform post-validation processing. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會處理事件以確保使用者所輸入的只是正整數。The following code example handles the event to ensure that only positive integers are entered by the user. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分參考主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#40)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellValueChanged As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 儲存格的值變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of a cell changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 認可，使用者指定的值時，就會發生事件這通常發生於焦點離開儲存格。The event occurs when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell. 在核取方塊儲存格，不過，您通常要立即處理此變更。In the case of check box cells, however, you will typically want to handle the change immediately. 若要在按下儲存格時，請認可變更，您必須處理事件。To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the event. 在處理常式中，核取方塊儲存格的目前儲存格時，呼叫方法並傳入值。In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. 資料格的值變更時，不會自動排序控制項中的資料列。Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when a cell value is changed. 若要在使用者修改資料格時，排序控制項，請呼叫方法中的事件處理常式。To sort the control when the user modifies a cell, call the method in a event handler. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件，以更新中的餘額資料行的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to update the values in a balance column of a . 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/CS/form1.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/VB/form1.vb#30)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellValueNeeded As DataGridViewCellValueEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 控制項的 屬性為 ，且 需要有儲存格的值，才能格式化並顯示此儲存格時。

span.span: Occurs when the property of the control is and the requires a value for a cell in order to format and display the cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 填入使用自訂資料存放區資料的資料格，而不會造成資料列變成非共用的虛擬模式中使用此事件。Use this event in virtual mode to populate cells with data from a custom data store without causing rows to become unshared. 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需虛擬模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的虛擬模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 若要將使用者指定的值加入至您的自訂資料存放區中，處理事件。To add user-specified values to your custom data store, handle the event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會處理事件，以填入儲存格的正整數。The following code example handles the event to populate cells with positive integers. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分參考主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellValuePushed As DataGridViewCellValueEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 控制項的 屬性為 ，且儲存格值已變更，並需要在基礎資料來源中有儲存區時。

span.span: Occurs when the property of the control is and a cell value has changed and requires storage in the underlying data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者指定的資料更新的自訂資料存放區中的虛擬模式使用此事件。Use this event in virtual mode to update a custom data store with user-specified data. 處理事件，以擷取控制項中顯示的資料存放區中的值。Handle the event to retrieve values from the data store for display in the control. 如需虛擬模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的虛擬模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會處理事件，以更新和新的項目儲存在資料存放區物件。The following code example handles the event to store updates and new entries in a data store object. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分參考主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#10)]

summary.span: 取消選取目前已選取的儲存格。

span.span: Cancels the selection of currently selected cells.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ClearSelection() cil managed

summary.span: 取消選取所有選取的儲存格來清除目前的選取範圍。

span.span: Clears the current selection by unselecting all selected cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫此方法時，每個資料行和資料列的屬性設定為`false`。When this method is called, each column and row's property is set to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會同時清除選取。The following code example clears the selection of the . 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的名為`dataGridView1`和名為`clearSelectionButton`，並確定其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and a named `clearSelectionButton`, and ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#170](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#170)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#170](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#170)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected void ClearSelection (int columnIndexException, int rowIndexException, bool selectExceptionElement);
.method familyhidebysig instance void ClearSelection(int32 columnIndexException, int32 rowIndexException, bool selectExceptionElement) cil managed
Protected Sub ClearSelection (columnIndexException As Integer, rowIndexException As Integer, selectExceptionElement As Boolean)
protected: void ClearSelection(int columnIndexException, int rowIndexException, bool selectExceptionElement);

span.span: The column index to exclude.
The row index to exclude.

param.name: selectExceptionElement
param.span: 表示選取被排除的儲存格、資料列或資料行， 則表示保留其原始狀態。

span.span: to select the excluded cell, row, or column; to retain its original state.

summary.span: 取消選取目前已選取的所有儲存格 (除了指示的儲存格以外)，並選擇性地確定所指示的儲存格已選取。

span.span: Cancels the selection of all currently selected cells except the one indicated, optionally ensuring that the indicated cell is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`rowIndexException`值為-1 表示資料行標頭，和`columnIndexException`值為-1 表示資料列標頭。A `rowIndexException` value of -1 represents a column header, and a `columnIndexException` value of -1 represents a row header. 這個方法很有用，但不取消選取的資料格、 資料列或例外狀況索引所指示的資料行中清除目前選取範圍。This method is useful to clear the current selection without canceling the selection of the cell, row, or column indicated by the exception indexes. 如果屬性值，可讓個別儲存格選取範圍，這個方法會設定的每個資料格屬性`false`，排除資料列和資料行指定的儲存格。If the property value allows individual cell selection, this method sets the property of each cell to `false`, excluding the cell in the row and column specified. 如果屬性值，可讓完整的資料列或資料行選取項目，這個方法也集每個資料列或資料行的屬性`false`、 不含資料列或資料行，內含指定的儲存格。If the property value allows full row or column selection, this method also sets the property of each row or column to `false`, excluding the row or column containing the specified cell. 排除的資料格、 資料列或資料行可能會或可能未處於選取狀態時呼叫這個方法。The excluded cell, row, or column may or may not be in the selected state when this method is called. 這個方法會選取它如果`selectExceptionElement`參數值是`true`。This method selects it if the `selectExceptionElement` parameter value is `true`. 根據選取模式，整個資料列或資料行可能也會選取結果。Depending on the selection mode, the entire row or column may also be selected as a result.

exception.span: 大於最高的資料行索引。

span.span: is greater than the highest column index.
-or-

exception.span: 當 為 時， 小於 -1；否則 小於 0。

span.span: is less than -1 when is ; otherwise, is less than 0.
-or-

exception.span: 大於最高的資料列索引。

span.span: is greater than the highest row index.
-or-

exception.span: 當 為 時， 小於 -1；否則 小於 0。

span.span: is less than -1 when is ; otherwise, is less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode ClipboardCopyMode { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否可以將儲存格文字值複製到 ，以及是否會包含資料列和資料行標頭文字。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users can copy cell text values to the and whether row and column header text is included.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項將每個選取的資料格的文字表示法複製到剪貼簿。The control copies the text representation of each selected cell to the Clipboard. 這個值是資料格的值轉換成字串或影像資料格的值為屬性。This value is the cell value converted to a string or, for image cells, the value of the property. 值會複製到剪貼簿， ， ，和格式。Values are copied to the Clipboard in , , , and formats. 這些格式是用於將內容貼到 [記事本] 之類的應用程式[!INCLUDE[ofprexcel](~/includes/ofprexcel-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/includes/ofprword-md.md)]。These formats are useful for pasting content into applications such as Notepad, [!INCLUDE[ofprexcel](~/includes/ofprexcel-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/includes/ofprword-md.md)]. 控制項複製包含所有選取的儲存格的最小矩形中包含的資料格。The control copies the cells contained in the smallest rectangle that includes all selected cells. 資料列和資料行不包含任何選取的資料格不會出現在複製的資料中。Rows and columns that do not contain any selected cells are not represented in the copied data. 其餘的資料列和資料行中任何未選取資料格會以空白預留位置表示。Any unselected cells in the remaining rows and columns are represented by blank placeholders. 根據複製模式和選取模式，複製的資料列和資料行的標頭值可能會複製，以及。Depending on the copy mode and the selection mode, header values for the copied rows and columns may be copied, as well. 當使用者複製內容，控制項會將到剪貼簿。When users copy content, the control adds a to the Clipboard. 這個資料物件會從方法。This data object is retrieved from the method. 當您想要以程式設計方式將資料物件加入至剪貼簿時，您可以呼叫這個方法。You can call this method when you want to programmatically add the data object to the Clipboard. 方法會擷取個別資料格的值，藉由呼叫方法。The method retrieves values for individual cells by calling the method. 您可以覆寫一個或兩個自訂複製的儲存格的版面配置，或以支援其他資料格式的衍生類別中的這些方法。You can override either or both of these methods in derived classes to customize the layout of copied cells or to support additional data formats. 如需剪貼簿 作業和資料格式的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about Clipboard operations and data formats, see the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何啟用複製控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to enable copying in the control. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 啟用的使用者複製多個儲存格至剪貼簿] 從 [Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Enable Users to Copy Multiple Cells to the Clipboard from the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性設為 0 將會移除所有的資料行從。Setting the property to 0 will remove all columns from the . 如果會重設為值小於目前的值，就移除資料行從結尾集合。If is reset to a value less than the current value, columns will be removed from the end of the collection. 如果設為比目前的值更大的值，將資料行加入至結尾集合。If is set to a value greater than the current value, columns will be added to the end of the collection. 這個屬性可以搭配屬性來建立簡單顯示和編輯文字。This property can be used with the property to create a simple for displaying and editing text. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the , , , , , , , , , and properties. 此外，程式碼範例示範如何設定和屬性。In addition, the code example demonstrates how to set the and properties. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的名為`dataGridView1`，然後呼叫`SetUpDataGridView`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理常式。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 請確定所有事件都都具有其事件處理常式相關聯。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. summary.span: 使用者按兩下兩個資料行之間的分割線時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user double-clicks a divider between two columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此事件來自訂發生於使用者按兩下資料行分割線的自動調整大小行為。You can use this event to customize the automatic sizing behavior that occurs when a user double-clicks a column divider. 例如，您可以處理這個事件來以程式設計方式調整大小資料行只會根據目前可見的資料列中的內容使用大量的資料列時，避免使用預設行為對效能產生影響。For example, you can handle this event to programmatically resize columns based only on the content in the rows that are currently visible, avoiding a performance impact with the default behavior when working with a large number of rows. 資料行屬性不會擴充的區域，使用者可以連按兩下。The column property does not extend the area in which a user can double-click. 如果已透過這個屬性使用增加的分割線的寬度，當使用者按兩下分割線與相鄰的資料行之間的界限時，就會發生此事件。If the width of a divider has been increased through the use of this property, this event occurs when the user double-clicks the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 使用者按一下資料行行首時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks a column header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 資料行標題中時按下的預設行為是根據所按的資料行的方格資料列的順序，或反轉排序次序，如果按下的資料行的已排序方格。When a column heading is clicked in a , the default behavior is to order the grid rows based on the clicked column, or to reverse the sort order if the grid is already sorted by the clicked column. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個事件來執行模擬按一下的預設行為的程式設計排序時已停用的預設行為。The following code example demonstrates how to use this event to perform a programmatic sort that emulates the default behavior of clicking a when the default behavior has been disabled. 在此範例中，設，因此按一下選取資料行的內容。In this example, the is set to , so clicking the selects the contents of the column. 預設資料行標頭如預期般運作的範例程式碼中，按一下將資料載入每次變更的行為需求。For the example code to function as intended, the default column header click behavior needs to be changed each time the data is loaded into the . 新增提供變更的預設行為的程式碼的事件處理常式。Add a event handler to provide the code that changes the default behavior. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的名為`dataGridView1`，並確定其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果以外屬性設定為、屬性必須是系統色彩。If the property is set to anything other than , the property must be a system color. 您無法將此屬性設定為值，這是唯讀，這個值表示，已使用自訂的框線樣式屬性。You cannot set this property to the value, which is a read-only value indicating that the border style has been customized through the use of the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果已啟用視覺化樣式的應用程式透過方法和屬性是`true`，資料行標頭會使用目前的佈景主題來繪製。If visual styles are enabled for the application through the method and the property is `true`, the column headers are painted using the current theme. 在此情況下，值以外的所有資料行標頭，則會都忽略屬性，不套用的佈景主題。In this case, the value of the property is ignored for all column headers except the , to which the theme is not applied. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the , , , , , , , , , and properties. 此外，程式碼範例示範如何設定和屬性。In addition, the code example demonstrates how to set the and properties. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的名為`dataGridView1`，然後呼叫`SetUpDataGridView`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理常式。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named`dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 請確定所有事件都都具有其事件處理常式相關聯。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. span.span: Gets or sets the default column header style.
A that represents the default column header style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值傳回由此屬性有下列的初始屬性值：The default returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` 屬性`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|預設值Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| || 屬性的值。The value of the property.| || 屬性的值。The value of the property.| || 屬性的值。The value of the property.| || 屬性的值。The value of the property.| || 屬性的值。The value of the property.| ||| ||| 這些值會自動覆寫透過設定的值屬性。These values automatically override the values set through the property. 若要強制繼承的資料行標頭值，您必須設定的值物件設為預設值所指示類別。To force column headers to inherit the values, you must set the values in the object to the default values indicated for the class. 如需儲存格樣式繼承的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如果已啟用視覺化樣式和設`true`，以外的所有標頭資料格會使用目前的佈景主題來繪製和值會被忽略。If visual styles are enabled and is set to `true`, all header cells except the are painted using the current theme and the values are ignored. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the , , , , , , , , , and properties. 此外，程式碼範例示範如何設定和屬性。In addition, the code example demonstrates how to set the and properties. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的名為`dataGridView1`，然後呼叫`SetUpDataGridView`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理常式。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 請確定所有事件都都具有其事件處理常式相關聯。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. The default is 23.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode ColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewColumnHeadersHeightSizeMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出資料行標頭的高度是否可以調整，以及使用者是否可以調整此高度，或是會配合標頭內容，自動調整此高度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height of the column headers is adjustable and whether it can be adjusted by the user or is automatically adjusted to fit the contents of the headers.

value.span: 值，指出資料行標頭資料列的高度可以根據哪一個模式來調整。

span.span: A value indicating the mode by which the height of the column headers row can be adjusted.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為，使用者不能調整資料行行首的高度。When this property is set to , the height of the column headers cannot be adjusted by the user. 若要以程式設計方式調整資料行行首的高度，請使用方法或一組屬性。To adjust the height of the column headers programmatically, use the method or set the property. 若要設定資料列標頭的大小調整模式，使用屬性。To set the sizing mode for the row headers, use the property. 對於儲存格的內容分成多行換行，資料行標頭會重新調整大小時，作用中的資料格的儲存格樣式必須屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 如需標頭的調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about header sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 控制項不支援雙重緩衝。The control does not support double buffering. 如果設`true`中衍生控制項，使用者將不會收到的視覺化回饋時調整資料列、 資料行或標頭的大小，或重新排序資料行。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性來控制項主要是供顯示。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此範例中，自訂控制項的視覺外觀的數種方式，控制項設定為有限的互動性。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#20)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性是`false`，資料行其屬性設定為`true`仍能調整使用者介面 (UI) 中使用滑鼠游標右框線要調整大小之資料行上的任何位置按一下。If the property is `false`, a column whose property is set to `true` can still be resized in the user interface (UI) by clicking with the mouse cursor anywhere along the right border of the column to be resized. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會填入解除繫結控制項和集合屬性`true`以確保資料行標頭會顯示。The following code example populates an unbound control and sets the property to `true` to ensure that column headers are displayed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會嘗試將格式化的使用者指定的值轉換為基礎的資料格的資料類型。This method attempts to convert the formatted, user-specified value to the underlying cell data type. 若要這樣做，便會產生事件，您可以處理自訂型別轉換。To do this, it raises the event, which you can handle to customize the type conversion. 否則，會使用預設的型別轉換子。Otherwise, default type converters are used. 如果例外狀況造成轉換錯誤以防止它不處理事件。Conversion errors may result in an exception if the event is not handled to prevent it. 如果成功轉換的值，便被認可至資料存放區引發非資料繫結的事件資料格時屬性值是`true`。If the value is successfully converted, it is committed to the data store, raising the event for non-data-bound cells when the property value is `true`. 如果值為成功認可，就會發生事件。If the value is successfully committed, the event occurs. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會呼叫方法內引發的事件處理常式事件。The following code example calls the method within a event handler to raise the event. 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項按鈕資料行中的 停用按鈕](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Disable Buttons in a Button Column in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisabledButtons#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisabledButtons/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisabledButtons#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisabledButtons/VB/form1.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCell ^ CurrentCell { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCell ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCell ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定目前的現用儲存格。

span.span: Gets or sets the currently active cell.

value.span: ，表示目前的儲存格；如果沒有目前的儲存格，則為 。

span.span: The that represents the current cell, or if there is no current cell.

value.span: 預設為第一個資料行中的第一個儲存格，如果控制項中沒有任何儲存格，則為 。

span.span: The default is the first cell in the first column or if there are no cells in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將儲存格設定為目前的儲存格時，它會捲動到檢視如果目前沒有顯示。When you set a cell as the current cell, it will scroll into view if it is not currently displayed. 隱藏的資料列或資料行不可標頭資料格、 已停用的資料格或儲存格的目前儲存格。The current cell cannot be a header cell, a disabled cell, or a cell in a hidden row or column. 您可以將此屬性設定為`null`暫時移除焦點矩形，但是當控制項取得焦點，而且這個屬性的值是`null`，它會自動設定的值為屬性。You can set this property to `null` to temporarily remove the focus rectangle, but when the control receives focus and the value of this property is `null`, it is automatically set to the value of the property. 當您變更這個屬性的值時事件發生之前事件。When you change the value of this property, the event occurs before the event. 任何事件處理常式存取屬性此時會取得先前的值。Any event handler accessing the property at this time will get its previous value. 當您繫結到外部資料來源，這個屬性會重設為其預設值。When you bind the to an external data source, this property is reset to its default value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何確保目前儲存格顯示藉由設定排序後透過擷取至資料格屬性屬性。The following code example illustrates how to ensure that the current cell is visible after sorting by setting the property to the cell retrieved through the property. 此程式碼僅適用於未繫結控制項。This code works only with an unbound control. 與控制項繫結至外部資料來源，目前儲存格不會自動保存排序時。With a control bound to an external data source, the current cell is not automatically persisted when sorting. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含名為`dataGridView1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`. 在 C# 中，您也必須連接事件，事件處理常式。In C#, you must also connect the event to the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#150](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#150)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#150](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#150)]

exception.span: 因為無法認可或取消目前儲存格的變更，所以無法設定這個屬性的值。

exception.span: 當 繫結至 時，只允許重新進入呼叫。

exception.span: 設定這個屬性時，指定的儲存格不在 中。

public: property System::Drawing::Point CurrentCellAddress { System::Drawing::Point get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前的現用儲存格的資料列和資料行的索引。

span.span: Gets the row and column indexes of the currently active cell.

value.span: ，表示目前作用中之儲存格的資料列和資料行索引。

span.span: A that represents the row and column indexes of the currently active cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來判斷資料列和資料行的目前儲存格，而不需要直接存取儲存格。Use this property to determine the row and column of the current cell without accessing the cell directly. 這非常有用，以避免資料列取消共用。This is useful to avoid unsharing shared rows. 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用列繪製案例中的屬性。The following code example illustrates how to use the property in a row-painting scenario. 在範例中，這個屬性用來儲存目前的儲存格的資料列索引。In the example, this property is used to store the row index of the current cell. 當使用者變更目前的儲存格至不同的資料列時，資料列會強制重繪本身。When the user changes the current cell to a different row, the row is forced to repaint itself. 此程式碼是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#19)]

summary.span: 當儲存格狀態變更是與儲存格內容變更有關時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the state of a cell changes in relation to a change in its contents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料格被標示為已修改，如果其內容已變更，但變更尚未儲存。A cell is marked as modified if its contents have changed but the change has not been saved. 已編輯資料格，但是變更尚未認可的資料快取，或取消編輯作業時，通常就會發生此事件。This event typically occurs when a cell has been edited but the change has not been committed to the data cache, or when an edit operation is canceled. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event. 在此範例中，事件處理常式會呼叫方法，以引發事件，並判斷目前的值。In this example, the event handler calls the method to raise the event and determine the current value of a . 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項按鈕資料行中的 停用按鈕](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Disable Buttons in a Button Column in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisabledButtons#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisabledButtons/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisabledButtons#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisabledButtons/VB/form1.vb#5)]

summary.span: 取得包含目前儲存格的資料列。

span.span: Gets the row containing the current cell.

value.span: ，表示包含目前儲存格的資料列；如果沒有目前儲存格，則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要變更目前的資料列，您必須設定所需的資料列中的資料格的屬性。To change the current row, you must set the property to a cell in the desired row.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DataBindingComplete As DataGridViewBindingCompleteEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於資料繫結作業完成之後。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 或內容的資料來源變更時，會引發這個事件的值， ，或屬性變更。This event is raised when the contents of the data source change or when the value of the , , or property changes. 處理這個事件非常有用，例如，若要以程式設計方式調整大小資料列和資料行的內容更新為基礎。Handling this event is useful, for example, to programmatically resize rows and columns based on content updates. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用此事件。The following code example illustrates the use of this event. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#05](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/CS/Form1.cs#05)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#05](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/VB/Form1.vb#05)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DataError As DataGridViewDataErrorEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於外部資料剖析或驗證作業擲回例外狀況時，或是嘗試讓資料來源認可資料，但卻失敗時。

span.span: Occurs when an external data-parsing or validation operation throws an exception, or when an attempt to commit data to a data source fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可讓您處理資料處理作業期間會呼叫控制項的程式碼中擲回的例外狀況。The event enables you to handle exceptions thrown in code that is called by the control during data processing operations. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 和屬性通常與此事件相關聯的物件表示儲存格所在資料時發生錯誤。The and properties of the object associated with this event normally indicate the cell in which the data error occurred. 發生錯誤時在外部資料來源，不過，資料來源可能不會提供發生錯誤的資料行。When the error occurs in an external data source, however, the data source may not provide the column in which the error occurred. 在此情況下，屬性通常表示在發生錯誤時的目前儲存格的資料行。In this case, the property typically indicates the column of the current cell at the time of the error. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範事件處理常式。The following code example demonstrates a event handler. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#50)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#50)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#50)]

summary.span: 取得或設定資料來源中， 會顯示資料之清單或資料表的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the list or table in the data source for which the is displaying data.

value.span: 中， 會顯示資料之資料表或清單的名稱。

span.span: The name of the table or list in the for which the is displaying data.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繫結至資料來源包含多個清單或資料表時，這個屬性是很有用。This property is useful when binding to a data source that contains multiple lists or tables. 您不需要繫結至包含單一清單或資料表的資料來源時，設定此屬性。You do not need to set this property when binding to a data source that contains a single list or table. 例如，您可以繫結控制權傳輸至，包含單一資料表，但未設定這個屬性。For example, you can bind a control to a that contains a single table without setting this property. 如果包含多個資料表，不過，您必須設定此屬性的其中一個資料表名稱。If the contains multiple tables, however, you must set this property to the name of one of the tables. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明這個屬性的常見用途。The following code example illustrates a common use for this property. 在範例中，控制項，名為`customersDataGridView`繫結至名為`customersDataSet`。In the example, a control named `customersDataGridView` is bound to a named `customersDataSet`. 這包含名為 「 客戶 」 資料表。This contains a table named "Customers". 屬性設定為資料表的名稱。The property is set to the name of the table. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#020](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#020)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#020](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#020)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
