summary.span: 取得或設定 會為其顯示資料的資料來源。

span.span: Gets or sets the data source that the is displaying data for.

value.span: 包含要供 顯示之資料的物件。

span.span: The object that contains data for the to display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別支援標準的 Windows Form 資料繫結模型。The class supports the standard Windows Forms data-binding model. 這表示資料來源可以是任何型別會實作下列介面的其中一個：This means the data source can be of any type that implements one of the following interfaces: - 介面，包括一維陣列。The interface, including one-dimensional arrays. - 介面，例如和類別。The interface, such as the and classes. - 介面，例如類別。The interface, such as the class. - 介面，例如類別。The interface, such as the class. 如需特定範例，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節和工作表的這個區段結尾。For specific examples, see the Example section and the task table at the end of this section. 一般而言，您會繫結，以元件，並繫結元件至另一個資料來源，或使用商務物件填入。Typically, you will bind to a component and bind the component to another data source or populate it with business objects. 元件是慣用的資料來源，因為它可以繫結至各種資料來源，並自動解決許多資料繫結問題。The component is the preferred data source because it can bind to a wide variety of data sources and can resolve many data binding issues automatically. 當繫結至資料來源包含多個清單或資料表，您必須設定屬性設為指定之清單或繫結至資料表的字串。When binding to a data source that contains multiple lists or tables, you must set the property to a string that specifies the list or table to bind to. 當繫結至元件包含多個清單或資料表，不過，您可以設定屬性元件改為。When binding to a component that contains multiple lists or tables, however, you can set the property of the component instead. 當繫結的物件集合，而不資料庫資料，您通常會設定屬性所傳回的物件屬性`null`而不是使用預設值的，也就是適用於資料庫資料。When binding to an object collection rather than to database data, you will typically set the property of the object returned by the property to `null` rather than using the default value of , which is appropriate for database data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中顯示的資料](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/displaying-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Displaying Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/displaying-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 下表提供相關的一般工作的直接連結屬性。The following table provides direct links to common tasks related to the property. 請參閱[逐步解說： 建立主從式表單使用兩個 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/creating-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md)和[How to： 將物件繫結至 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-objects-to-windows-forms-datagridview-controls.md)。See [Walkthrough: Creating a Master/Detail Form Using Two Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/creating-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md) and [How to: Bind Objects to Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-objects-to-windows-forms-datagridview-controls.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化簡單資料繫結。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a simple data-bound . 它也會示範如何設定屬性。It also demonstrates how to set the property. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewSimpleBound#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewSimpleBound/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewSimpleBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewSimpleBound/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewSimpleBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewSimpleBound/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ DefaultCellStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 中的儲存格所要套用的預設儲存格樣式 (前提是未設定其他儲存格樣式屬性)。

span.span: Gets or sets the default cell style to be applied to the cells in the if no other cell style properties are set.
The to be applied as the default style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項會顯示其使用由儲存格樣式的儲存格屬性，其他屬性的型別繼承樣式。The control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell property, which inherits styles from other properties of type . 透過指定的樣式屬性會影響所有的資料格時覆寫下列屬性透過指定的樣式除外：The styles specified through the property affect all cells except when overridden by the styles specified through the following properties: - - - - - 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 取得這個屬性，當預設值將會建立值如果屬性已不被存取。When getting this property, a with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed. 取得這個屬性的多個資料列時，這可能會造成效能影響。This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows. 您應該盡可能使用單一設定此屬性的多個資料列。Whenever possible, use a single to set this property for multiple rows. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將說明中的此屬性使用控制項主要是供顯示。The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此範例中，自訂控制項的視覺外觀的數種方式，控制項設定為有限的互動性。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#20)]

summary.span: 使用者在資料列中輸入新記錄以便填入預設值時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user enters the row for new records so that it can be populated with default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可讓您填入新的記錄的資料列，當使用者輸入的資料列。This event lets you populate the row for new records when the user enters the row. 初始資料列的值來自於屬性每個資料行所傳回屬性。Initial values for the row come from the property of the returned by each column's property. 在資料繫結模式中，所有資料格的資料繫結資料行儲存在外部資料來源的值。In data bound mode, all cell values for data bound columns are stored in the external data source. 當使用者輸入新記錄的資料列時之前, 的資料來源中建立新的資料列就會發生事件。When the user enters the row for new records, a new row is created in the data source before the event occurs. 當您擴展屬性在事件處理常式中，這些值會加入至資料來源直接。When you populate the property in your event handler, the values are added directly to the data source. 在虛擬模式中之後就會發生此事件，,就會發生事件的新資料列中的每個資料格，讓您可以在您的自訂資料存放區中儲存的預設值。In virtual mode, after this event occurs, the event occurs for each cell in the new row so that you can store the default values in your custom data store. 然後，中新的資料列，每一個資料格就會發生事件擷取的值儲存在事件，然後顯示。Then, the event occurs for each cell in the new row, retrieving the values that you stored in the event, which are then displayed. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理此事件。The following code example illustrates how this event can be handled. 在範例中，指定資料行的資料格會填入預設值。In the example, cells for the given columns are populated with default values. 如`CustomerID`資料行，此值會從不同的方法 （未實作） 會產生唯一的客戶識別碼。For the `CustomerID` column, the value is retrieved from a separate method (not implemented) that generates a unique customer ID. 若要執行此範例中，資料行名稱的名稱取代實際的資料行物件控制，並提供適當的預設值。To run this example, replace the column names with the names of the column objects from an actual control and provide appropriate default values. 當指定資料行名稱，您必須使用資料行物件，而不是資料行的標頭文字的名稱。When specifying columns by name, you must use the name of the column object and not the column header text. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#120)]

summary.span: 如果具有編輯控制項的儲存格位於編輯模式下，則取得目前儲存格所裝載的控制項。

span.span: Gets the control hosted by the current cell, if a cell with an editing control is in edit mode.
The hosted by the current cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果資料格不是處於編輯模式，或資料格類型並不支援編輯控制項，這個屬性會傳回`null`。If the cell is not in edit mode or the cell type does not accommodate an editing control, this property returns `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性的自訂儲存格類型覆寫方法中。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in an overridden method of a custom cell type. 在範例中，編輯控制項的參考為擷取、 轉換成自訂的編輯控制項類型，，然後填入儲存格的目前值。In the example, a reference to the editing control is retrieved, cast to a custom editing control type, and then populated with the current value of the cell. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 儲存格的主控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#210](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/CS/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.cs#210)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#210](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/VB/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.vb#210)]

summary.span: 顯示編輯儲存格的控制項時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a control for editing a cell is showing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以處理這個事件，儲存格進入編輯模式時執行的編輯控制項的自訂初始化。You can handle this event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode. 若要自訂控制項的顯示特性，設定所傳回的物件的屬性屬性。To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the property. 若要執行其他初始化，將值轉型的屬性設定為特定控制項類型，並直接存取的成員。To perform other initialization, cast the value of the property to the specific control type and access the members directly. 例如，您可以處理事件，以將事件處理常式附加至編輯控制項的事件。For example, you can handle the event to attach event-handlers to the events of the editing control. > [!NOTE] > 控制項裝載一個編輯控制項一次，並重複使用的編輯控制項，只要編輯之間不會變更資料格類型。The control hosts one editing control at a time, and reuses the editing control whenever the cell type does not change between edits. 時將事件處理常式附加至編輯控制項，因此您必須採取預防措施，以避免將相同的處理常式附加多次。When attaching event-handlers to the editing control, you must therefore take precautions to avoid attaching the same handler multiple times. 若要避免這個問題，請從前您附加至事件的處理常式的事件中移除處理常式。To avoid this problem, remove the handler from the event before you attach the handler to the event. 這將避免重複，如果此處理常式已附加至事件，但否則沒有任何作用。This will prevent duplication if the handler is already attached to the event, but will have no effect otherwise. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例程式碼類別概觀。For more information, see the example code in the class overview. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理這個事件來變更屬性的目前儲存格。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the property of the current cell. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的名為`dataGridView1`，並確定事件是否與此事件處理常式相關聯。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and ensure that the event is associated with the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#210](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#210)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#210](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#210)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以為您的應用程式啟用視覺化樣式，藉由呼叫方法之前先呼叫方法。You can enable visual styles for your application by calling the method before calling the method. 如果設`true`，以外的所有標頭資料格會使用目前的佈景主題來繪製。If is set to `true`, all header cells except the are painted using the current theme. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何停用的資料列和資料行標頭啟用視覺化樣式的應用程式中的視覺化樣式。The following code example demonstrates how to disable visual styles for the row and column headers in an application that has visual styles enabled. 在此範例中，視覺化樣式已啟用應用程式藉由呼叫方法中的`Main`。In this example, visual styles have been enabled for the application by calling the method in `Main`. 不過，視覺化樣式會套用至資料列和資料行標頭因為設`false`。However, visual styles will not be applied to the row and column headers because is set to `false`. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷哪一個儲存格是在第一個資料列和目前顯示在控制項中的資料行。You can use this property to determine which cell is in the first row and column currently displayed in the control. 一般而言，這是在左上角，但它是由右至左語言的右上角。Typically, this is in the upper left corner, but for right-to-left languages, it is in the upper right corner. 您也可以設定這個屬性，以將控制項捲動至指示的儲存格。You can also set this property to scroll the control to the indicated cell. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何確保目前儲存格顯示完成排序之後。The following code example illustrates how to ensure that the current cell is visible after sorting. 此程式碼僅適用於未繫結控制項。This code works only with an unbound control. 與控制項繫結至外部資料來源，目前儲存格不會自動保存排序時。With a control bound to an external data source, the current cell is not automatically persisted when sorting. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含名為`dataGridView1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`. 在 C# 中，您也必須連接事件，事件處理常式。In C#, you must also connect the event to the event handler. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是環境的屬性。The property is an ambient property. 環境屬性是控制項屬性，如果未設定，將擷取從父控制項。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，具有相同做為其父系預設。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 如需環境屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱類別或類別概觀。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. 因為是不可變的 （表示您不能調整的任何屬性），您只能指派新屬性物件。Because the is immutable (meaning that you cannot adjust any of its properties), you can only assign the property a new object. 不過，您可以根據現有的字型為新字型。However, you can base the new font on the existing font. 控制項使用的值屬性的預設值為屬性所傳回的物件， ，和屬性。The control uses the value of the property as the default value of the properties of objects returned by the , , and properties. 變更值會自動更新， ，和內容，變更任何繼承值的資料格的字型。Changing the value automatically updates the , , and properties, changing the font for any cell that inherits the value. 根據預設，標頭資料格覆寫的值，您可以覆寫特定資料列、 資料行和資料格的值。Header cells override the value by default, and you can override the value for specific rows, columns, and cells. 如需儲存格樣式繼承的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 建立未繫結的 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-an-unbound-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Create an Unbound Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-an-unbound-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取表示所選取的資料格定義的區域資料。This method retrieves data that represents the region defined by the selected cells. 此區域是最小的矩形，其中包含所有選取的資料格。This region is the smallest rectangle that includes all of the selected cells. 在此區域中的每個所選資料格的值藉由呼叫擷取方法。The value for each selected cell in this region is retrieved by calling the method. 未選取的資料格，在此區域中，會使用空白預留位置值。Blank placeholder values are used for unselected cells in this region. 這個方法會結合這些值插入包含數種格式來複製到剪貼簿。This method combines these values into a containing several formats for copying to the clipboard. 支援剪貼簿格式包括， ， ，和。The supported clipboard formats include , , , and . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入 選取到剪貼簿內容。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add selected content to the Clipboard. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 啟用的使用者複製多個儲存格至剪貼簿] 從 [Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Enable Users to Copy Multiple Cells to the Clipboard from the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是以強制重新繪製儲存格通常不會導致重新繪製該儲存格的狀況中很有用。This method is useful to force a cell repaint in conditions that would not normally cause a cell to be repainted. 例如，您可以使用這個方法會變更其外觀外部事件的自訂儲存格類型。For example, you can use this method with a custom cell type that changes its appearance as a result of external events. 如需繪製和失效的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about painting and invalidation, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個方法中的自訂，當滑鼠指標停留在其上繪製有自訂框線。The following code example illustrates how to use this method in a customized that is painted with a custom border when the mouse pointer rests on it. 在範例中，當滑鼠指標進入或離開失效的儲存格。In the example, the cell is invalidated when the mouse pointer enters or leaves it. 此程式碼是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂資料格和擴充其行為和外觀的 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-cells-and-columns-in-the-datagrid-by-extending-behavior.md)。This code is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize Cells and Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control by Extending Their Behavior and Appearance](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-cells-and-columns-in-the-datagrid-by-extending-behavior.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 當未繫結至資料的儲存格的編輯會被視為認可，當使用者移到另一個資料格。When the is not bound to data, the cell edit is considered committed when the user moves to another cell. 如果資料列標頭可見，鉛筆字符的會顯示標頭中包含未認可的變更儲存格的資料列。If row headers are visible, a pencil glyph is present in the header for the row that contains a cell with uncommitted changes. 如果是`true`和目前的儲存格裝載編輯控制項，您可以透過擷取屬性。If is `true` and the current cell hosts an editing control, you can retrieve it through the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來判斷是否要認可儲存格值，並引發事件的處理常式從事件。The following code example uses the property to determine whether to commit a cell value and raise the event from a handler for the event. 這個程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項按鈕資料行中的 停用按鈕](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Disable Buttons in a Button Column in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回`true`鉛筆圖像 （glyph） 的資料列中顯示時。This property returns `true` when the pencil glyph is displayed in the row. 根據預設，屬性會一律等於值屬性，除非繫結至資料來源的已實作支援編輯或虛擬模式使用資料列層級認可範圍。By default, the property will always equal the value of the property, unless the is bound to a data source that supports editing, or virtual mode has been implemented to use row-level commit scope. 在這些情況下，將評估此資料列層級的屬性。In these cases, the will evaluate this property at the row level. 當使用者導覽離開該資料列中時，控制項就會認可所有資料列變更。When the user navigates away from the row, the control commits all row changes. 使用者也可以按 CTRL + ENTER 認可資料列變更，而不需離開資料列。The user can also press CTRL+ENTER to commit row changes without leaving the row. 若要以程式設計方式認可的資料列變更，呼叫表單的方法。To commit row changes programmatically, call the form's method. 如果您的資料來源是，您也可以呼叫。If your data source is a , you can also call .

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to select more than one cell, row, or column of the at a time.

value.span: 如果使用者可以同時選取一個以上的儲存格、資料列或資料行，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the user can select more than one cell, row, or column at a time; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`，多個項目 （儲存格、 資料列或資料行） 中可選取控制項。When the property is set to `true`, multiple elements (cells, rows, or columns) can be selected in the control. 若要選取多個項目，使用者可以按住 CTRL 鍵，同時按一下選取的項目。To select multiple elements, the user can hold down the CTRL key while clicking the elements to select. 按一下以選取的第一個項目，然後按住 SHIFT 鍵，按一下以選取的最後一個項目時，可以選取連續的項目。Consecutive elements can be selected by clicking the first element to select and then, while holding down the SHIFT key, clicking the last element to select. 選取範圍根據屬性。The selection scope is based on the property. 例如，如果設，使用者可以選取多個資料行。For example, if is set to , the user can select multiple columns. 您可以使用屬性，以允許使用者選取多個項目中的控制，以及所有選取的項目上執行作業。You can use the property to allow a user to select multiple elements in the control and perform an operation on all the selected elements. 例如，使用者可以選取多個資料格，然後以滑鼠右鍵按一下選取的儲存格顯示快顯功能表會顯示一組在選取的資料格上執行的工作。For example, the user could select multiple cells and then right-click a selected cell to display a shortcut menu that displays a set of tasks to perform on the selected cells. 若要判斷哪些資料格、 資料列或資料行中所選控制項，您可以存取， ，或屬性。To determine which cells, rows, or columns are selected in the control, you can access the , , or property. 若要判斷選取的資料格數目，請呼叫方法的引數值。To determine the number of selected cells, call the method with an argument value of . 使用方法來擷取選取的資料列的數目和方法來擷取資料行數目。Use the method to retrieve the number of selected rows and the method to retrieve the number of columns. 這些方法會比直接存取集合，使用大量的資料時更有效率。These methods are more efficient than accessing the collections directly when working with large amounts of data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的名為`dataGridView1`，然後呼叫`SetUpDataGridView`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理常式。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 請確定所有事件都都具有其事件處理常式相關聯。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/VB/form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#273](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#273)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#273](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#273)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非是`false`，這個屬性的值等於資料列數目減 1 控制項中。Unless is `false`, the value of this property is equal to the number of rows in the control minus 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當是在虛擬模式中，此事件可讓新的資料列的資料存放區中建立新的項目，而且它也允許填入預設值的資料列。When the is in virtual mode, this event allows a new entry to be created in the data store for the new row, and it also allows for the row to be populated with default values. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用事件來追蹤何時會加入新的資料列，因此邏輯事件處理常式可以初始化新的資料列的資料格為初始值。The following code example uses the event to track when a new row is being added, so logic in the event handler can initialize a new row's cell to an initial value. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分參考主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用來允許通知的自訂儲存格類型當有未認可的變更。This method can be used to allow custom cell types to notify the when they have uncommitted changes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用自訂儲存格案例中，這個方法。The following code example illustrates the use of this method in a custom cell scenario. 在範例中，實作衍生自類別覆寫方法，並使用方法，以表示變更控制項。In the example, an implementation derived from the class overrides the method and uses the method to indicate a change to the control. 這個範例是顯示在較大範例的一部分[How to： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 儲存格的主控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。This example is part of a larger example shown in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md). summary.span: 引發 事件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `clipBounds`參數代表的區域，需要重新繪製。The `clipBounds` parameter represents the area of the that needs to be repainted. 例如，如果使用者涵蓋整個與另一個視窗，然後發現，`clipBounds`代表整個。For example, if a user covers the entire with another window and then uncovers it, then `clipBounds` represents the entire . 如果使用者涵蓋的範圍縮小，然後發現，`clipBounds`表示所涵蓋的小型區域。If a user covers a small area of the and then uncovers it, then `clipBounds` represents the small area that was covered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫金鑰處理方法適用於按鍵 (例如，方法在按下 F2 時)，並傳回該方法的傳回值。This method calls the key-processing method appropriate to the key pressed (for example, the method when F2 is pressed) and returns the return value of that method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何變更的 ENTER 鍵，在行為藉由覆寫子類別和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to change the behavior of the ENTER key in a subclass by overriding the and methods. 在範例中，ENTER 鍵會具有相同的行為，向右箭號的索引鍵，讓使用者編輯資料的單一資料列中的多個資料格更容易。In the example, the ENTER key has the same behavior as the RIGHT ARROW key, making it easier for a user to edit multiple cells in a single row of data. The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料格為唯讀如果的值屬性是`true`資料格、 資料格的資料列儲存格的資料行，或。A cell is read-only if the value of the property is `true` for the cell, the cell's row, the cell's column, or the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將說明中的此屬性使用控制項主要是供顯示。The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此範例中，自訂控制項的視覺外觀的數種方式，控制項設定為有限的互動性。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#20)]

exception.span: 當設定這個屬性時的指定值為 、目前的儲存格位於編輯模式中，而且目前的儲存格包含無法認可的變更。

span.span: The specified value when setting this property is , the current cell is in edit mode, and the current cell contains changes that cannot be committed.

exception.span: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值會讓控制項進入編輯模式，但編輯儲存格值的初始設定失敗，而且 事件沒有處理常式或處理常式已將 屬性設定為 。

span.span: The specified value when setting this property would cause the control to enter edit mode, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the event or the handler has set the property to .

exception.span: 例外狀況物件通常可轉換成 類型。

span.span: The exception object can typically be cast to type .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ReadOnlyChanged As EventHandler

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#274](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#274)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#274](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#274)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool RefreshEdit() cil managed

summary.span: 儲存格在編輯模式下時，使用基礎儲存格值重新整理目前儲存格的值，並捨棄先前的任何值。

span.span: Refreshes the value of the current cell with the underlying cell value when the cell is in edit mode, discarding any previous value.

returns.span: 如果成功，則為 ；如果發生 事件，則為 。

span.span: if successful; if a event occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法，以強制更新處於編輯模式下顯示值的資料格。Call this method to force a cell to update its display value in edit mode. 當外部處理序會修改儲存格的值，而且您想要通知使用者變更，即使使用者指定的變更將會遺失如此一來，這非常有用。This is useful when an external process modifies the cell value and you want to notify the user of the change, even when a user-specified change is lost as a result.

summary.span: 發生於需要資料列的捷徑功能表時。

span.span: Occurs when a row's shortcut menu is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只發生事件時控制項屬性設定或其屬性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 處理事件很實用，當您想要顯示的捷徑功能表，取決於資料列的目前狀態或包含的值。Handling the event is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by a row's current state or the values it contains. 當您處理您指定的處理常式中的捷徑功能表會顯示事件，每當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下資料列除非覆寫已按下的特定資料格的捷徑功能表。When you handle the event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a row unless the overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked. 事件也會發生值擷取屬性，或是以程式設計的方式，或當使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵資料列。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a row. 您可以使用屬性來判斷的值或資料列的狀態變更或修改使用這項資訊屬性。You can use the property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the property. 這個屬性會使用資料列的值初始化事件值會覆寫的屬性。This property is initialized with the value of the row property, which the event value overrides. 處理事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的資料列設定多個資料列的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row value for multiple rows. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會處理事件以提供根據員工的標題。The following code example handles the event to provide a based on the title of the employee. 在此範例中，有兩個捷徑功能表，一個管理員，一個用於所有其他員工。In this example, there are two shortcut menus, one for managers and one for all other employees. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/CS/Form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/VB/Form1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int RowCount { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 中顯示的資料列數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows displayed in the .

value.span: 要顯示在 中的資料列數目。

span.span: The number of rows to display in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果設定的值小於目前的值，以資料列會移除結尾集合。If is set to a value less than the current value, rows will be removed from the end of the collection. 如果設為大於目前的值的值，資料列會加入至結尾集合。If is set to a value greater than the current value, rows will be added to the end of the collection. 其他資料列會根據中指定的資料列屬性。The additional rows are based on the row specified in the property. 如果您設定屬性設為 0，所有資料列會移除。If you set the property to 0, all rows will be removed from the . 這就相當於呼叫方法。This is equivalent to calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果是`true`，您不能設定設為 0。If is `true`, you cannot set to 0. 在此情況下，呼叫方法來移除新記錄的資料列以外的所有資料列。In this case, call the method to remove all rows except the row for new records. 呼叫具有相同的結果做為設定1 在此情況下，但是會更快。Calling has the same result as setting to 1 in this case, but is much faster. 屬性可以搭配屬性來建立簡單顯示和編輯文字。The property can be used with the property to create a simple for displaying and editing text. 如果您設定屬性設為大於 0 的值不使用資料行，控制會自動加入。If you set the property to a value greater than 0 for a control without columns, a is added automatically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 在此範例中，這個屬性用來追蹤中的項目數。In this example, this property is used to track the number of entries in a . 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/VB/form1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RowDefaultCellStyleChanged As DataGridViewRowEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於資料列的 屬性值變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property for a row changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時，就會發生此事件屬性傳回屬性資料列設定為新的值，或當的資料列的屬性設定為新包含至少一個屬性值不同於上一個儲存格style 物件。This event occurs when any property of the returned by the property for a row is set to a new value or when the property for a row is set to a new with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#340](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#340)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#340](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#340)]

summary.span: 發生於 控制項的 屬性為 ，且 需要判斷目前的資料列是否有未經認可的變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the property of the control is and the needs to determine whether the current row has uncommitted changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，此事件設定屬性`true`如果已修改目前的資料列中的任何資料格。By default, this event sets the property to `true` if any cells in the current row have been modified. 這會導致事件發生時使用者會還原到資料列的編輯。This causes the event to occur when the user reverts edits to a row. 使用者可以編輯內容還原到一個資料列兩次時儲存格處於編輯模式，或一次編輯模式之外，請按下 esc 鍵。Users can revert edits to a row by pressing ESC twice when a cell is in edit mode or once outside of edit mode. 此事件可用來設定自訂的虛擬模式中的認可範圍屬性設為正確的值，視所選擇的認可範圍而定。This event can be used for customizing commit scope in virtual mode by setting the property to the correct value depending on the chosen commit scope. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理這個事件來提供資料格層級認可範圍，這表示使用者可以還原目前的儲存格的變更。The following code example demonstrates how to handle this event to provide cell-level commit scope, meaning that the user can revert changes to the current cell only. 在認可資料格層級範圍內，資料列會被視為有未經認可變更時，才目前儲存格有未認可的變更，而不是當資料列中的任何資料格有未認可的變更。In cell-level commit scope, the row is treated as having uncommitted changes only when the current cell has uncommitted changes, rather than when any cell in the row has uncommitted changes. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中實作虛擬模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [Walkthrough: Implementing Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#160](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/CPP/virtualmode.cpp#160)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#160](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/CS/virtualmode.cs#160)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#160](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/VB/virtualmode.vb#160)]

summary.span: 使用者按兩下兩列資料列之間的分割線時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user double-clicks the divider between two rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此事件來自訂發生於使用者按兩下資料列分割線的自動調整大小行為。You can use this event to customize the automatic sizing behavior that occurs when a user double-clicks a row divider. 資料列屬性不會擴充的區域，使用者可以連按兩下。The row property does not extend the area in which a user can double-click. 如果已透過這個屬性使用增加的分割線的高度，當使用者按兩下分割線與相鄰的資料行之間的界限時，就會發生此事件。If the height of a divider has been increased through the use of this property, this event occurs when the user double-clicks the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#342](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#342)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#342](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#342)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 藉由設定修改的分割線的高度屬性。The divider height is modified by setting the property. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 發生於資料列收到輸入焦點，但尚未變成目前的資料列之前。

span.span: Occurs when a row receives input focus but before it becomes the current row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會發生此事件時一開始載入時，以及當使用者選取目前的資料列以外的資料列。This event occurs when the is initially loaded, as well as when the user selects a row other than the current row. 此事件之前發生更新屬性。This event occurs before the property is updated. 若要擷取新輸入資料列的索引，使用內的事件處理常式屬性。To retrieve the index of the newly-entered row, use the property within the event handler. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理這個事件來變更中目前資料列的資料格屬性。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the property of the cells in the current row. 在此範例中，背景色彩設定事件，然後重設為上事件。In this example, the background color is set in the event, then reset to on the event. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的名為`dataGridView1`，並確保其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`, and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#200](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#200)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#200](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#200)]

summary.span: 發生於需要資料列的錯誤文字時。

span.span: Occurs when a row's error text is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只發生事件時屬性控制項設定或其屬性是`true`。The event occurs only when the property of the control is set or its property is `true`. 處理事件很實用，當您想要判斷視其狀態和它所包含的值而定的資料列的錯誤。Handling the event is useful when you want to determine the error for a row depending on its state and the values it contains. 當您處理事件，並指定錯誤文字中處理常式中，資料列標頭顯示錯誤圖像除非屬性設定為`false`。When you handle the event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the row header unless the property is set to `false`. 當使用者將滑鼠指標移錯誤圖像時，錯誤文字會出現在工具提示中。When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip. 事件也會發生值擷取屬性。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved. 您可以使用屬性來判斷的值或資料列的狀態變更或修改使用這項資訊屬性。You can use the property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the property. 這個屬性會使用資料列的值初始化事件值會覆寫的屬性。This property is initialized with the value of the row property, which the event value overrides. 處理事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的資料列設定多個資料列的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row value for multiple rows. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RowHeaderCellChanged As DataGridViewRowEventHandler

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果以外屬性設定為、屬性必須是系統色彩。If the property is set to anything other than , the property must be a system color. 您無法將此屬性設定為值，這是唯讀，這個值表示，已使用自訂的框線樣式屬性。You cannot set this property to the value, which is a read-only value indicating that the border style has been customized through the use of the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果已啟用視覺化樣式的應用程式透過方法和屬性是`true`，資料列標頭會使用目前的佈景主題來繪製。If visual styles are enabled for the application through the method and the property is `true`, the row headers are painted using the current theme. 在此情況下，值所有資料列以外的標頭，則會忽略屬性，不套用的佈景主題。In this case, the value of the property is ignored for all row headers except the , to which the theme is not applied. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值傳回由此屬性有下列的初始屬性值。The default returned by this property has the following initial property values. |DataGridViewCellStyle 屬性DataGridViewCellStyle property|預設值Default value| |------------------------------------|-------------------| || 屬性的值。The value of the property.| || 屬性的值。The value of the property.| || 屬性的值。The value of the property.| || 屬性的值。The value of the property.| || 屬性的值。The value of the property.| ||| ||| 這些值會自動覆寫透過設定的值屬性。These values automatically override the values set through the property. 若要強制繼承的資料列標頭值，您必須設定的值物件設為預設值所指示類別。To force row headers to inherit the values, you must set the values in the object to the default values indicated for the class. 如需儲存格樣式繼承的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性來使用自訂色彩。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a with custom colors. 請注意如何屬性設定為，以便從繼承值物件。Note how the property is set to so that the value is inherited from the object. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example provided in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性是`false`，一個資料列的屬性設定為`true`仍能調整使用者介面 (UI) 中按一下任何位置沿著底部框線要調整大小的資料列的滑鼠游標。If the property is `false`, a row whose property is set to `true` can still be resized in the user interface (UI) by clicking the mouse cursor anywhere along the bottom border of the row to be resized. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the , , , , , , , , , and properties. 此外，程式碼範例示範如何設定和屬性。In addition, the code example demonstrates how to set the and properties. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的名為`dataGridView1`，然後呼叫`SetUpDataGridView`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理常式。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 請確定所有事件都都具有其事件處理常式相關聯。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. summary.span: 取得或設定包含資料列行首的資料行寬度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the width, in pixels, of the column that contains the row headers.

value.span: 包含資料列行首的資料行之寬度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The width, in pixels, of the column that contains row headers.
The default is 43.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以用來調整資料列標題資料行指定寬度。The property can be used to resize the row header column to a specified width. 若要調整此欄位至最適大小的資料列標題儲存格內容的寬度，請使用方法。To adjust the width of this column to fit the contents of the row header cells, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用列繪製案例中的屬性。The following code example illustrates how to use the property in a row-painting scenario. 在範例中，這個屬性的值用來計算在其中繪製自訂背景的界限。In the example, the value of this property is used to calculate the bounds within which a custom background is drawn. 此程式碼是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code is part of a larger example available in[How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode RowHeadersWidthSizeMode { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出資料列標頭的寬度是否可以調整，以及使用者是否可以調整此寬度，或是會配合標頭內容，自動調整此寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the width of the row headers is adjustable and whether it can be adjusted by the user or is automatically adjusted to fit the contents of the headers.

value.span: 值，指出資料列標頭的寬度可以根據哪一個模式來調整。

span.span: A value indicating the mode by which the width of the row headers can be adjusted.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為自動調整大小模式時，使用者不能調整資料列行首的寬度。When this property is set to an automatic sizing mode, the width of the row headers cannot be adjusted by the user. 若要以程式設計方式調整資料列行首的高度，請使用方法或一組屬性。To adjust the height of the row headers programmatically, use the method or set the property. 若要設定資料行標頭的調整模式，使用屬性。To set the sizing mode for the column headers, use the property. 如需標頭的調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about header sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 控制項不支援雙重緩衝。The control does not support double buffering. 如果設`true`中衍生控制項，使用者將不會收到的視覺化回饋時調整資料列、 資料行或標頭的大小，或重新排序資料行。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性來控制項主要是供顯示。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此範例中，自訂控制項的視覺外觀的數種方式，控制項設定為有限的互動性。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RowHeightChanged As DataGridViewRowEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於資料列的 屬性值變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property for a row changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用此事件。The following code example illustrates the use of this event. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#40)]

summary.span: 要求有關資料列高度的資訊時發生。

span.span: Occurs when information about row height is requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可用於排序作業之後保留自訂的資料列的高度。This event is useful for preserving custom row heights after a sorting operation. 這是必要的因為排序作業通常會由資料來源不會不追蹤的資料列與控制項中的資料列之間的對應。This is necessary because sorting operations are normally handled by the data source, which does not keep track of the correspondence between rows of data and rows in the control. 只會發生此事件時屬性已設定或當屬性是`true`。This event occurs only when the property has been set or when the property is `true`. 在後者的情況下，您可以提供您自己的資料存放區和排序作業。In the latter case, you provide your own data store and sorting operations. 處理事件儲存在使用者變更資料列高度時的更新的高度資訊。Handle the event to store updated height information when the user changes a row height. 使用控制項需要它時，擷取預存的高度資訊。Use to retrieve the stored height information when the control needs it. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#351](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#351)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#351](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#351)]

summary.span: 使用者變更資料列的高度時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user changes the height of a row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會引發這個事件時屬性設定為`true`或以外屬性設定為值`null`。This event is raised when the property is set to `true` or the property is set to a value other than `null`. 此事件用來追蹤和儲存資料列高度的資訊，讓它可以在排序作業之後還原。This event is used to track and store row height information so that it can be restored after a sorting operation. 若要還原高度的資訊，請處理事件。To restore height information, handle the event. 請注意，只有當使用者變更資料列高度時，才發生此事件。Note that this event occurs only when the user changes the height of a row. 如果您以程式設計方式變更資料列高度，您必須儲存在同一時間的新高度資訊。If you change the height of a row programmatically, you must store the new height information at the same time. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#352](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#352)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#352](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#352)]

summary.span: 資料列失去輸入焦點且不再是目前資料列時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a row loses input focus and is no longer the current row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理這個事件來變更中目前資料列的資料格屬性。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the property of the cells in the current row. 在此範例中，背景色彩設定事件，然後重設為上事件。In this example, the background color is set in the event, then reset to on the event. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的名為`dataGridView1`，並確定其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RowPostPaint As DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventHandler

summary.span: 發生在繪製 之後。

span.span: Occurs after a is painted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以處理這個事件，單獨使用或搭配事件，以自訂控制項中的資料列的外觀。You can handle this event alone or in combination with the event to customize the appearance of rows in the control. 您可以繪製整個資料列，您自己，或 [小畫家] 的資料列的特定部分，並使用下列方法來繪製其他部分的類別：You can paint entire rows yourself, or paint specific parts of rows and use the following methods of the class to paint other parts: - - - - - 您也可以使用類別來繪製標準控制項使用的目前佈景主題。You can also use the class to paint standard controls using the current theme. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[視覺化樣式呈現控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). 如果您使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，您也可以存取的標準映像，您可以使用大型的程式庫控制項。If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the control. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的處理常式來繪製文字的內容跨越的一般資料格值下方的整個資料列的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the event to paint textual content that spans the entire row below the normal cell values. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#30)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RowPrePaint As DataGridViewRowPrePaintEventHandler

summary.span: 發生在繪製 之前。

span.span: Occurs before a is painted

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以處理這個事件，單獨使用或搭配事件，以自訂控制項中的資料列的外觀。You can handle this event alone or in combination with the event to customize the appearance of rows in the control. 您可以繪製整個資料列，您自己，或 [小畫家] 的資料列的特定部分，並使用下列方法來繪製其他部分的類別：You can paint entire rows yourself, or paint specific parts of rows and use the following methods of the class to paint other parts: - - - - - 您也可以使用類別來繪製標準控制項使用的目前佈景主題。You can also use the class to paint standard controls using the current theme. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[視覺化樣式呈現控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). 如果您使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，您也可以存取的標準映像，您可以使用大型的程式庫控制項。If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the control. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的處理常式來繪製背景漸層的資料列，如果在選取的資料列的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the event to paint a gradient row background if the row is selected. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Rows As DataGridViewRowCollection

summary.span: 取得集合，其中包含 控制項中的所有資料列。

span.span: Gets a collection that contains all the rows in the control.
A that contains all the rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用手動填入集合而不是繫結至資料來源的控制項。You can use the collection to manually populate a control instead of binding it to a data source. 下列範例會示範如何以手動方式加入和插入資料列。The following example shows you how to manually add and insert rows. 這個範例假設您已加入四個至控制項的執行個體集合。This example assumes that you have added four instances to the control's collection. ```vb Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight") Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four") ``` ```csharp this.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight");this.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four"); ``` 如需詳細的範例，以程式設計方式填入解除繫結控制，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節。For a detailed example that programmatically populates an unbound control, see the Example section. 資料列包含資料格的值以外的樣式資訊。Rows include style information in addition to cell values. 基於這個理由，您可能想要加入或插入資料列，根據現有的資料列已設定樣式。For this reason, you might want to add or insert rows based on existing rows that you have already styled. 您可以使用， ， ，和方法。You can do this using the , , , and methods. 您也可以使用修改控制項中的值，或移除資料列的集合。You can also use the collection to modify the values in the control or to remove rows. 您可以修改值，或移除資料列，不論是否在控制項繫結至外部資料來源。You can modify values or remove rows regardless of whether the control is bound to an external data source. 如果沒有資料來源，會直接變更資料來源。If there is a data source, the changes are made directly to the data source. 您可能仍然需要將資料來源更新推送至遠端資料庫，不過。You may still need to push the data source updates to a remote database, however. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 將資料繫結至 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-data-to-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [How to: Bind Data to the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-data-to-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 下列範例會示範如何以程式設計方式修改資料格的值。The following example shows you how to modify cell values programmatically. ```vb ' Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. Me.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value" ' The previous line is equivalent to the following line. Me.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value" ``` ```csharp // Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. this.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value"; // The previous line is equivalent to the following line. this.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value"; ``` 除了標準的集合的功能，您可以使用来擷取的資料列的相關資訊集合。In addition to the standard collection capabilities, you can use the collection to retrieve information about rows. 使用方法，以判斷特定的資料列的狀態。Use the method to determine the state of a particular row. 使用和方法來判斷資料列數目或結合的特定狀態中的資料列高度。Use the and methods to determine the number of rows or the combined height of rows in a particular state. 若要擷取具有特定狀態的資料列的索引，使用， ， ，和方法。To retrieve the index of a row with a particular state, use the , , , and methods. 下列範例會示範如何擷取索引的第一個選取的資料列，並再用它來以程式設計方式刪除資料列。The following example shows you how to retrieve the index of the first selected row, and then use it to programmatically delete the row. ```vb Dim rowToDelete As Int32 = Me.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( _ DataGridViewElementStates.Selected) If rowToDelete > -1 Then Me.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete) End If ``` ```csharp Int32 rowToDelete = this.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( DataGridViewElementStates.Selected); if (rowToDelete > -1) { this.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete); } ``` 為了改善效能，傳回屬性可包含共用和非共用的資料列。To improve performance, the returned by the property can include shared and unshared rows. 共用的資料列共用記憶體來降低成本的大型記錄集。Shared rows share memory to reduce the cost of a large record set. 如果您的資料錄集非常大，您應該將共用的資料列最大的存取時小心屬性。If your record set is very large, you should be careful to keep the rows shared as much as possible when accessing the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立未繫結; 設定， ，和[屬性]，並使用和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to create an unbound ; set the , , and properties; and use the and properties. 它也會示範如何使用的版本和方法，以適當的設定資料行標頭和資料列大小。It also demonstrates how to use a version of the and methods to properly size the column headers and the rows. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含名為`dataGridView1`和名為按鈕`Button1`，然後呼叫`InitializeDataGridView`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理常式。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and a button named `Button1`, and then call the `InitializeDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 請確定所有事件都已都連接其事件處理常式。Ensure all events are connected with their event handlers. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RowsAdded As DataGridViewRowsAddedEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於新的資料列加入 之後。

span.span: Occurs after a new row is added to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加入新的資料列時，不會自動排序控制項中的資料列。Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added. 若要排序新的資料列到正確的位置，請呼叫方法中的事件處理常式。To sort new rows into their correct position, call the method in a event handler. 當使用者將使用新的記錄，資料列的新資料列值的處理常式中這個事件是等於新的記錄的資料列的新位置的索引是其中一種大於剛才加入的資料列。When the user adds a new row using the row for new records, the value in the handler for this event is equal to the index of the new location of the row for new records, which is one greater than the row just added. 當您將加入資料列以程式設計的方式，不過，值是加入第一個資料列的索引。When you add rows programmatically, however, the value is the index of the first row added. 在虛擬模式中，會發生此事件之前事件可用來建立新記錄中，您可以在中填入資料存放區和事件處理常式。In virtual mode, this event occurs before the event and can be used to create new records in your data store that you can then populate in the event handler. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會處理事件，以遞增的虛擬機器中的資料列數目。The following code example handles the event to increment the number of rows in a virtual . 用於資料列數目處理常式，讓它知道時顯示空白資料格與初始化的新資料列儲存格。The number of rows is used in the handler so it knows when to show a blank cell versus an initialized cell for a new row. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分參考主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#20)]
