summary.span: 取得或設定 的資料列儲存格所套用的預設樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the default style applied to the row cells of the .

value.span: 的資料列儲存格所要套用的 。

span.span: The to apply to the row cells of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項會顯示其使用由儲存格樣式的儲存格屬性，其他屬性的型別繼承樣式。The control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell property, which inherits styles from other properties of type . 中的所有資料列的資料格，但不包括標頭資料格，透過指定的樣式屬性覆寫透過指定的樣式和屬性，並透過所指定的樣式會覆寫， ，和屬性。For cells in all rows, excluding header cells, the styles specified through the property override the styles specified through the and properties, and are overridden by the styles specified through the , , and properties. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 取得這個屬性，當預設值將會建立值如果屬性已不被存取。When getting this property, a with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed. 取得這個屬性的多個資料列時，這可能會造成效能影響。This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows. 您應該盡可能使用單一設定此屬性的多個資料列。Whenever possible, use a single to set this property for multiple rows. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性來建立在分類帳效果控制項。The following code example illustrates how to use this property to create a ledger effect in a control. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RowsDefaultCellStyleChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 屬性的值變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性時，就會發生此事件傳回屬性設定為新值或當屬性設定為新包含至少一個屬性值不同於上一個儲存格樣式物件。This event occurs when a property of the returned by the property is set to a new value or when the property is set to a new with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#279](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#279)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#279](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#279)]

summary.span: 發生於從 中刪除資料列時。

span.span: Occurs when a row or rows are deleted from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當從刪除資料列控制項，後續的資料列的索引編號會降低補償。When rows are deleted from a control, the index numbers of subsequent rows are lowered to compensate. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用此事件可更新的平衡資料行中的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use this event to update the values in a balance column of a . 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/CS/form1.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/VB/form1.vb#30)]

summary.span: 資料列變更狀態 (例如失去或獲得輸入焦點) 時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a row changes state, such as losing or gaining input focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewRow ^ RowTemplate { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewRow ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewRow ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定表示控制項中所有資料列之樣板的資料列。

span.span: Gets or sets the row that represents the template for all the rows in the control.
A representing the row template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有時候您想進一步控制的外觀資料列所提供的各種儲存格樣式屬性。Sometimes you want greater control over the appearance of rows than what is provided by the various cell style properties. 屬性可讓您建立和初始化用做的所有資料列範本，包括新的記錄的資料列如果是`true`。The property lets you create and initialize a for use as a template by all rows, including the row for new records if is `true`. 當您要設定屬性，例如資料列高度的預設值，這非常有用。This is useful when you are setting default values for properties such as row height. 例如，您可以增加預設資料列高度，以便可以提供額外的空間，一般儲存格內容下方顯示跨越多個資料行的內容。For example, you may want to increase the default row height in order to provide extra room beneath ordinary cell content for displaying content that spans multiple columns. 設定資料列範本時，需要外部資料，都會使用自訂類型衍生自類別。Setting the row template is necessary when external data is displayed using custom types derived from the class. 使用未繫結控制項，您可以透過程式設計方式填入與自訂資料列型別的執行個體的集合。With unbound controls, you can programmatically populate the collection with instances of your custom row type. 顯示外部資料時，不過，資料列會自動產生，但它們所根據的資料列範本，您可以將自訂資料列型別的執行個體。When displaying external data, however, the rows are generated automatically, but they are based on the row template, which you can set to an instance of your custom row type. 如果這個屬性尚未設定第一次擷取其值，新建立並傳回。If this property has not been set the first time you retrieve its value, a new is created and returned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用資料列範本指定初始資料列高度和最小資料列高度。The following code example illustrates how to use the row template to specify an initial row height and a minimum row height. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate/CPP/datagridviewrowtemplate.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate/CS/datagridviewrowtemplate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate/VB/datagridviewrowtemplate.vb#1)]

summary.span: 資料列狀態從共用變成不共用時發生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以在開發和測試期間使用這個事件，找出造成資料列，從共用變更為非共用狀態的程式碼。You can use this event during development and testing to help identify code that causes rows to change from a shared to an unshared state. 縮放控制項以顯示大量資料時，這非常有用。This is useful when scaling the control to display large amounts of data. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 資料列完成驗證後發生。

span.span: Occurs after a row has finished validating.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個事件是類似於事件。This event is analogous to the event. 值的資料列上執行的後續處理工作中使用此事件。Use this event to perform post-processing on a row of values. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用此事件，以清除可能留下驗證資料列之後的任何錯誤註釋。The following code sample uses this event to clear up any error annotations that may have been left behind after validating the row. summary.span: 正在驗證資料列時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a row is validating.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個事件是類似於事件。This event is analogous to the event. 使用此事件在資料列的所有值上執行驗證。Use this event to perform validation on all the values of a row. 如果資料列未通過驗證時，設定屬性`true`。If the row does not pass validation, set the property to `true`. 取消這個事件會防止， ，和事件發生時，也會防止使用者離開無效的資料列，並防止資料列儲存至外部資料來源中資料繫結模式。Canceling this event prevents the , , and events from occurring, and also prevents the user from leaving the invalid row and prevents the row from being saved to an external data source in data bound mode. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用檢查如果輸入有效的追蹤與發行日期。The following code example uses to check if valid track and release dates are entered. summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中要顯示的捲軸類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of scroll bars to display for the control.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不論這個屬性的值，只在需要時才會顯示捲軸。Regardless of the value of this property, scroll bars are shown only when they are needed. 若要防止出現捲軸使用這個屬性。Use this property to prevent scroll bars from appearing. 例如，當您想要捲動提供替代的使用者介面 (UI)，這十分有用。This is useful, for example, when you want to provide an alternative user interface (UI) for scrolling.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當是在資料行選取模式，而且這個方法呼叫時，每個資料行屬性設定為`true`，和每個資料列屬性設定為`false`。When the is in column-selection mode and this method is called, each column's property is set to `true`, and each row's property is set to `false`. 相反地，當是在資料列選取模式，而且這個方法呼叫時，每個資料列屬性設定為`true`，和每個資料行屬性設定為`false`。Conversely, when the is in row-selection mode and this method is called, each row's property is set to `true`, and each column's property is set to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的名為`dataGridView1`和名為`selectAllButton`，並確定其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and a named `selectAllButton`, and ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性永遠會填入不論屬性值。The property is always populated regardless of the property value. 此屬性包含在其被參考的時間選取範圍的唯讀快照集。This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced. 如果您保留此集合的複本，它可能與不同的實際後續狀態中的使用者可能已變更選取項目。If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent state in which the user may have changed the selection. 因此，您不應該作業集合的複本上。Therefore, you should not operate on a copy of the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用集合選取範圍中尋找值的總和。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to find the sum of the values in the selection. 在範例中，這個集合會逐一查看和有效的值加入至顯示在標籤中的總和。In the example, this collection is iterated through and the valid values are added to the sum, which is displayed in a label. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 選取儲存格，或取消選取項目，以程式設計方式或藉由使用者動作時，就會發生此事件。This event occurs whenever cells are selected or the selection is canceled, whether programmatically or by user action. 例如，此事件時，您想要顯示目前選取的資料格的總和。For example, this event is useful when you want display the sum of the currently selected cells. 當您變更的值屬性，事件發生之前事件。When you change the value of the property, the event occurs before the event. 任何事件處理常式存取屬性此時會取得先前的值。Any event handler accessing the property at this time will get its previous value. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用此事件。The following code example demonstrates the use of this event. 在範例中，此表單會顯示所選的資料格的值的總和，並選取項目變更時，更新總和。In the example, the form displays the sum of values in the selected cells, and updates the sum when the selection changes. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性的值是`true`滑鼠指標位於儲存格上，當符合下列條件時，資料格會顯示工具提示：When the value of this property is `true` and the mouse pointer is over a cell, the cell displays a ToolTip when one of the following conditions is met: - 值屬性不是`null`或值的屬性是`true`，以及處理常式事件設定屬性以外的值為。The value of the property is not `null` or the value of the property is `true`, and a handler for the event sets the property to a value other than . - 儲存格的屬性有值以外。The property of the cell has a value other than . 當沒有設定這個屬性有任何作用事件處理常式自動取得屬性的值因為引發事件並傳回工具提示文字指定在事件處理常式。Setting this property has no effect when there is a event handler because getting the value of the property automatically raises the event and returns the ToolTip text specified in the event handler. - 儲存格顯示截斷資料格的值。The cell value is truncated in the cell display. 當資料格的值屬性值是，截斷的資料格的值的完整值會顯示在工具提示。When the value of the cell property value is , the full value of the truncated cell value is displayed in the ToolTip.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料列標頭會顯示目前儲存格處於編輯模式和使用者已變更之資料格時看起來像鉛筆編輯圖像。The row header will display an editing glyph that looks like a pencil when the current cell is in edit mode and the user has made changes to the cell. 編輯的圖像著色使用資料列的標頭資料格的屬性。The editing glyph is colored by using the property of the row header cell. 如果沒有可用的空間不足，無法完整顯示，則不會呈現圖像。The glyph is not rendered if there is not enough space to display it completely. 例如，如果資料列的標頭資料格都具有其屬性集，圖像會移除，如果沒有足夠的空間，文字及圖像 （glyph）。For example, if the row header cell has its property set, the glyph is removed if there is not enough room for both the text and glyph. 編輯圖像 （glyph） 的顯示由值虛擬模式中的屬性。The display of the editing glyph is controlled by the value of the property in virtual mode. 否則，它由屬性。Otherwise, it is controlled by the property. 標準圖像 （glyph） 的格式不公開。The standard glyph is not publicly exposed. 若要自訂圖像，您可以建立自訂類別。To customize the glyph, you can create a custom class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowRowErrors { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出針對包含資料項目錯誤的每一個資料列，是否會在資料列標頭顯示錯誤圖像。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether row headers will display error glyphs for each row that contains a data entry error.

value.span: 如果 指出有錯誤發生，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the indicates there is an error; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否在其中一個資料列中儲存格錯誤。The property indicates if there is an error in one of the cells in a row. 如果以外設定為值，然後錯誤圖像 (![ErrorProvider 圖示](~/add/media/vberrorprovidericon.gif "ErrorProvider 圖示")) 顯示資料列標頭。If is set to a value other than , then an error glyph (![ErrorProvider icon](~/add/media/vberrorprovidericon.gif "ErrorProvider icon")) is shown in the row header. 資料列標頭的預設寬度包含足夠空間可顯示錯誤圖像，會顯示圖像。The default width of the row header includes enough room to display the error glyph, whether or not the glyph is displayed. 如果資料列的標頭大小會調整，使其不沒有足夠的空間可顯示完整的圖像，就不會轉譯圖像。If the row header size is adjusted so that there is not enough space to display the glyph completely, the glyph is not rendered. 文字和圖像 （glyph），可顯示資料列標頭，因為標頭內容會顯示依優先順序，如下：Because row headers can display both text and glyphs, header content is displayed by priority, as follows: 1. 資料列的標頭資料格中所顯示的文字。Text displayed in the row header cell. 2. 編輯的圖像。The editing glyph. 3. 錯誤圖像。The error glyph. 比方說，如果資料列寬度就會減少，錯誤圖像會消失第一次，然後是標準的圖像，則文字。For example, if the row width is decreased, the error glyph disappears first, then the standard glyph, then text. 進階的使用者可以透過開發自訂的自訂錯誤圖像或類別。Advanced users can customize the error glyph by developing a custom or class.

summary.span: 將 控制項的內容排序。

span.span: Sorts the contents of the control.

Public Overridable Sub Sort (comparer As IComparer)

summary.span: 使用 介面的實作，將 控制項的內容排序。

span.span: Sorts the contents of the control using an implementation of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓的排序功能的進階的自訂類別。This method allows advanced customization of the sorting feature of the class. 若要實作高度自訂的排序作業，您可以撰寫事件處理常式事件和呼叫這個方法會實作類別的執行個體時做為參數的介面。In order to implement a highly customized sorting operation, you can write an event handler for the event and call this method with an instance of a class that implements the interface as a parameter. 在此情況下，您通常會設定屬性停用自動排序，並保留空間排序圖像。In this case, you will typically set the property to to disable automatic sorting and to leave room for a sorting glyph. 當設定為以程式設計方式排序模式資料行來排序，您必須顯示排序圖像自行設定屬性。When sorting by columns set to programmatic sort mode, you must display the sorting glyph yourself by setting the property. 這個方法適用於只有當屬性未設定。This method works only when the property is not set. 當您繫結控制項至外部資料來源，您必須使用該資料來源所提供的排序作業。When you bind the control to an external data source, you must use the sorting operations provided by that data source. 當您藉由實作虛擬模式提供您自己的資料來源時，您必須也排序作業自行處理。When you provide your own data source by implementing virtual mode, you must also handle the sorting operations yourself. 呼叫這個方法會自動設定屬性`null`。Calling this method automatically sets the property to `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用在多個資料行排序案例中的方法多載。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method overload in a multiple column sort scenario. 在此範例中，中實作介面`RowComparer`類別。In this example, the interface is implemented in the `RowComparer` class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewIComparerSort#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewIComparerSort/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewIComparerSort#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewIComparerSort/VB/form1.vb#10)]

summary.span: 根據指定資料行的內容，以遞增或遞減順序將 控制項的內容排序。

span.span: Sorts the contents of the control in ascending or descending order based on the contents of the specified column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的內容排序藉由比較指定的資料行中的值。This method sorts the contents of the by comparing values in the specified column. 根據預設，排序作業會使用方法來比較的資料行的使用中的儲存格組屬性。By default, the sort operation will use the method to compare pairs of cells in the column using the property. 使用的資料行屬性設定為、和屬性會自動設定並顯示適當的排序圖像。For columns with the property set to , the and properties are set automatically and the appropriate sorting glyph is displayed. 使用的資料行屬性設定為，您必須顯示排序圖像自行透過屬性。For columns with the property set to , you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the property. 您可以自訂處理這個方法所使用的排序作業事件。You can customize the sorting operation used by this method by handling the event. 只會發生此事件時屬性尚未設定。This event occurs only when the property has not been set. 當已設定屬性，這個方法適用於資料繫結資料行。When the property has been set, this method works for data-bound columns only. 資料繫結資料行有其屬性集。Data-bound columns have had their property set. 這會導致屬性，以傳回`true`。This causes the property to return `true`. 如果您控制項包含繫結和繫結資料行，您必須實作虛擬模式時排序控制項所繫結的資料行維持未繫結的資料行的值。If your control contains both bound and unbound columns, you must implement virtual mode to maintain the values of the unbound columns when the control is sorted by a bound column. 您可以藉由設定屬性`true`和處理事件。You can do this by setting the property to `true` and handling the event. 如果資料行是可編輯的您也應該處理事件。If the column is editable, you should also handle the event. 如需虛擬模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中實作虛擬模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about virtual mode, see [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 不支援資料繫結控制項時，依未繫結的資料行排序。Sorting by unbound columns when the control is data-bound is not supported. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用中以程式設計方式排序。The following code example demonstrates how to use the in a programmatic sort. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SortCompare As DataGridViewSortCompareEventHandler

summary.span: 發生在 比較兩個儲存格值來執行排序作業時。

span.span: Occurs when the compares two cell values to perform a sort operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只會發生此事件時屬性未設定而屬性值是`false`。This event occurs only when the property is not set and the property value is `false`. 這個事件會比較組排序的資料行中的資料格。This event compares pairs of cells in the column being sorted. 只有當使用者按一下資料行的標頭時，才發生屬性值為，或當您呼叫多載。It occurs only when the user clicks the header of a column with a property value of , or when you call the overload. 當發生此事件的資料行屬性值為，您必須顯示排序圖像自行透過屬性。When this event occurs for a column with a property value of , you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the property. 您可以使用這個事件來排序資料列或多個資料行中有一個資料行使用資料格的值。You can use this event to sort rows using the cell values in one column or in multiple columns. 使用和來比較資料格的值中指定的資料行中的屬性屬性。Use the and properties to compare cell values in the column specified in the property. 使用和屬性來存取透過其他資料行中的值集合。Use the and properties to access values in other columns through the collection. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用在多個資料行排序。The following code example demonstrates how to use the in a multiple column sort. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to： 自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中排序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Sorting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare/VB/form1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Sorted As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生在 控制項完成排序作業時。

span.span: Occurs when the control completes a sorting operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不會發生此事件時屬性設定為`true`和控制項所繫結的資料行排序。This event does not occur when the property is set to `true` and the control is sorted by an unbound column. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何確保目前儲存格顯示完成排序之後。The following code example illustrates how to ensure that the current cell is visible after sorting. 此程式碼僅適用於未繫結控制項。This code works only with an unbound control. 與控制項繫結至外部資料來源，目前儲存格不會自動保存排序時。With a control bound to an external data source, the current cell is not automatically persisted when sorting. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含名為`dataGridView1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`. 在 C# 中，您也必須連接事件，事件處理常式。In C#, you must also connect the event to the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#150](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#150)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#150](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#150)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SortedColumn As DataGridViewColumn

value.span: 內容目前排序所依據的 。

span.span: The by which the contents are currently sorted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未排序，此屬性會傳回`null`。If the is not sorted, this property will return `null`. 當這個屬性所表示的資料行具有屬性值為，它會顯示的值為基礎的排序圖像屬性。When the column indicated by this property has a property value of , it will display a sorting glyph based on the value of the property. 當資料行具有屬性值為，您必須顯示排序圖像自行透過屬性。When the column has a property value of , you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the property. > [!NOTE] > 當您排序控制項使用的自訂排序時，這個屬性的值沒有意義。The value of this property is not meaningful when you sort the control using custom sorting. 如需自訂排序的詳細資訊，請參閱方法和事件。For more information about custom sorting, see the method and the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用中的程式設計排序屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in a programmatic sort. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort/VB/form1.vb#10)]

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the items in the control are sorted in ascending or descending order, or are not sorted.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性用來判斷所指定資料行時，會出現的排序圖像屬性具有屬性值為。This property is used to determine which sorting glyph appears when the column specified by the property has a property value of . 當資料行具有屬性值為，您必須顯示並自行隱藏排序圖像，透過屬性。When the column has a property value of , you must display and hide the sorting glyph yourself through the property. 當資料行具有屬性值為，您可以顯示排序圖像，但如果資料行自動調整大小，它不保留空間。When the column has a property value of , you can display the sorting glyph, but space is not reserved for it if the column is automatically resized. > [!NOTE] > 當您排序控制項使用的自訂排序時，這個屬性的值沒有意義。The value of this property is not meaningful when you sort the control using custom sorting. 如需自訂排序的詳細資訊，請參閱方法和事件。For more information about custom sorting, see the method and the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用中的程式設計排序屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in a programmatic sort. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort/VB/form1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool StandardTab { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 TAB 鍵是否會將焦點移到定位順序中的下一個控制項，而不是將焦點移到控制項中的下一個儲存格。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the TAB key moves the focus to the next control in the tab order rather than moving focus to the next cell in the control.

value.span: 如果 TAB 鍵會將焦點移到定位順序中的下一個控制項，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the TAB key moves the focus to the next control in the tab order; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性設定為`false`允許 TAB 鍵將焦點移到透過儲存格的格線。Setting this property to `false` allows the TAB key to move the focus through the grid of cells. 下表描述如何儲存格焦點變更時按下指定的索引標籤組合。The following table describes how the cell focus changes when the given TAB key combinations are pressed. |按鍵組合Key combination|結果Result| |---------------------|------------| |TABTAB|如果屬性是`false`，焦點會移至下一個儲存格的資料列中。If the property is `false`, the focus moves to the next cell in the row. 如果焦點是在資料列中最後一個資料格中，焦點會移至下一個資料列中的第一個儲存格。If the focus is in the last cell in the row, the focus moves to the first cell in the next row. 當焦點在最後一個儲存格，焦點會移至定位順序中的下一個控制項。If the focus is in the last cell in the , the focus moves to the next control in the tab order.| |SHIFT+TABSHIFT+TAB|如果是`false`，焦點移到上一個儲存格的資料列中。If is `false`, the focus moves to the previous cell in the row. 如果焦點是資料列中第一個資料格中，焦點會移到最後一個先前的資料列中的資料格。If the focus is in the first cell in the row, the focus moves to the last cell in the previous row. 如果焦點是在第一個資料格中，焦點會移至定位順序中的上一個控制項。If the focus is in the first cell in the , the focus moves to the previous control in the tab order.| |CTRL+TABCTRL+TAB|焦點移至定位順序中的下一個控制項。The focus moves to the next control in the tab order.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性可讓您設定的儲存格的值、 關聯的捷徑功能表，或執行任何其他您可以針對執行的作業。Setting this property allows you to set a value for the cell, associate a shortcut menu with it, or perform any other operations you can perform on a . 在設計為使用由右至左語言的應用程式，這個屬性所表示的資料格通常是在右上角。In applications designed for use with right-to-left languages, the cell represented by this property is typically in the upper-right corner. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用這個屬性來顯示值的左上角控制項。The following code example uses this property to display a value in the upper-left corner of a control. 這個值會標示主要/詳細資料案例中的子資料表。This value labels a child table in a master/detail scenario. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. summary.span: 強制位於指定位置的儲存格更新其錯誤文字。

span.span: Forces the cell at the specified location to update its error text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法，當您儲存格錯誤文字自行維護由處理事件。Use this method when you maintain cell error text yourself by handling the event. 當您變更指定的儲存格的預存的錯誤文字時，請呼叫這個方法。Call this method when you change the stored error text for the specified cell. 這會使失效的儲存格，強制控制項來擷取更新的錯誤文字透過事件處理常式。This will invalidate the cell, forcing the control to retrieve the updated error text through the event handler. 雖然您可以使用這個方法來更新標題儲存格的錯誤，資料行首儲存格不會顯示錯誤圖像。Although you can use this method to update errors for header cells, column header cells do not display error glyphs.

span.span: is less than -1 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法，當您維護在虛擬模式中的資料格的值，然後在您的自訂資料快取之外的更新值事件處理常式。Use this method when you maintain cell values in virtual mode and you update a value in your custom data cache outside of a event handler. 這個方法會導致無效的資料格中，強制執行控制項擷取到的新值事件處理常式，並套用任何作用中的自動調整大小模式。This method invalidates the cell, forcing the control to retrieve the new value through the event handler and apply any automatic sizing modes that are in effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件來更新顯示中的項目總數的標籤。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to update a label displaying the total number of entries in a . 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#368](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#368)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#368](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#368)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免資料列刪除標記為已完成，可以取消這個事件。This event can be canceled to prevent a row deletion from being completed. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件，以取消刪除的資料列從如果開始的餘額資料列包含選取範圍中。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to cancel the deletion of rows from the if the starting balance row is included in the selection. 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 虛擬模式可供使用非常大型的存放區的資料。Virtual mode is designed for use with very large stores of data. 當屬性是`true`，您建立固定數目的資料列和資料行，然後控制代碼與事件，以填入資料格。When the property is `true`, you create a with a set number of rows and columns and then handle the event to populate the cells. 虛擬模式都必須實作以處理母體擴展、 編輯和刪除基礎資料快取資料格為基礎的使用者動作。Virtual mode requires implementation of an underlying data cache to handle the population, editing, and deletion of cells based on actions of the user. 如需實作虛擬模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 在 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中實作虛擬模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about implementing virtual mode, see [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 您必須使用保留的未繫結的資料行值的虛擬模式時控制項是在繫結模式。You must use virtual mode to maintain the values of unbound columns when the control is in bound mode. 不支援的繫結模式的未繫結資料行排序。Sorting by unbound columns in bound mode is not supported. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例程式碼會使用虛擬模式，來建立資料表的正整數。The following code example code uses virtual mode to create a table of positive integers. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#0)]
